bod kyi nang bstan dpe tshogs lte gnas / /
t-iBETAN bUDDH-iST rESXURCE cEN+TER tEXT sCAN iNPUT fXRM . t-iTLE pAGE wXRKH w19837 iMAGE gRXUPH i1pd27430 lccnH isbnH NA t-iTLEH shes bya'i gter mdzod ShES BYA-I GTER MDZXD UTHXRH mi rigs dpe mdzod khang M-i R-iGS DPE MDZXD KHANG dESCR-iPTXRH VXL. . HAVE -iMPR-iNTH H M-i R-iGS DPE SKRUN KHANG oR-iG-iNAL pUBL-iCAT-iXNH N(A|N)A pLACEH KHRENG TU'U pUBL-iShERH S-i KHRXN M-i R-iGS DPE SKRUN KHANG dATEH . wXLUMEH tXTAL wXLUMESH tbrc pAGESH iNTRXDUCTXRY pAGESH NA tEXT pAGESH NA sCAN+N-iNG iNFXRMAT-iXNH sCAN+NED AT t-iBETAN bUDDH-iST rESXURCE cEN+TER /

us.  @# / /
bod gangs can gyi grub mtha' ris med kyi mkhas dbang brgya dang brgyad cu lhag gi gsung 'bum so so'i dkar chag phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa shes bya'i gter mdzod ces bya ba bzhugs so / /
smad cha mi rigs dpe mdzod khang gis bsgrigs pa /
mi rigs dpe skrun khang /
gleng gzhi /
bod rigs ni rang rgyal gyi lo rgyus yun ring ldan pa'i mi rigs rlabs chen zhig yin la /
las la brtson zhing dpa' ba dang blo rig ldan pa zhig kyang red /
rlabs chen gyi mes rgyal gsar gtod byed pa'i go rim nang du byas rjes 'od stong 'bar ba bzhag yod cing /
lo rgyus 'phel rgyas kyi chu klung ring po 'di'i nang du bod mi rigs dang mi rigs gzhan dag thun mong thog nas mes rgyal gyi rig gzhung 'od stong rab tu 'phro ba zhig gsar gtod byas yod pa red /
bod yig gi dpe rnying 'di dag ni mes rgyal mi rigs kyi rig gzhung gi nor mdzod nang gi mu tig gzi 'od rab tu 'phro ba zhig red /
bod yig gi dpe rnying de dag dus rabs bcu gcig pa'i gong la sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab bsgyur rgyu de gtso bor byas shing /
de ni bod kyi btsan po mes dbon rnam gsum gyi dus nas 'go tshugs pa zhig red /
btsan po khri srong lde btsan gyi skabs su bsgyur zin pa'i gsung rab thams cad dkar chag tu bkod pa 'phang thang ma dang /
mchims phu ma /
ldan dkar ma gsum yod rung 'phang mchims gnyis kyi dkar chag 'thor gyar du song bas ldan dkar ma tsam las ma lus pa de ni bstan 'gyur gyi sna tshogs zhes pa'i khrod du bzhugs pa 'di yin /
dkar chag 'di'i nang bka' bstan gnyis sde tshan bcu dgur phyes te theg chen dang /
theg dman /
mdo phyogs /
sngags phyogs /
sde snod gsum bcas kyi go rim ltar phye thog mdo sde'i sde snod nang phar phyin dang /
phal chen /
dkon brtsegs /
bsdus pa chen po bcas kyi go rim ltar bsgrigs 'dug de ni gsung rab sde tshan dbye ba'i srol thog mar gtod pa zhig red /
bod la sangs rgyas chos lugs dar ba dang chags cig chos lugs grub mtha' 'dra min 'ga' re byung ba'i 'go tshugs shing /
dus rabs bcu gcig pa tshun tsam la gsung rab de dag gi dgongs 'grel dang /
lo rgyus /
skad yig rig gnas skor sogs kyi rtsom rig je mang du phyin te rtsom rig gi glegs bam ha cang mang po zhig dar ba red /
de dag ni bod yig gi dpe rnying nang gi grub cha gal chen zhig red /
nang don mdor bsdus na rig gnas che ba lnga ste bzo rig pa dang /
gso ba rig pa /
sgra rig pa /
gtan tshigs rig pa /
nang don rig pa bcas dang /
rig gnas chung ba lnga ste snyan ngag dang /
mngon brjod /
sdeb sbyor /
zlos gar /
skar rtsis bcas yod pa red /
lhag par du lo rgyus dang rnam thar skor gyi rtsom rig mang tsam zhig yod pa de'i nang nas bstan rtsis re'u mig dang /
rgyal rabs /
mi rigs bar gyi 'brel ba'i skor gyi lo rgyus /
chos 'byung /
grub mtha' so so'i bla rgyud /
gdung rabs /
rang rnam /
gsang ba'i rnam thar sogs dang /
gnas yig dang /
dgon pa'i gdan rabs sogs yod par ma zad /
gzhan yang mgur ma dang /
legs bshad /
bcad lhug spel ma'i snyan ngag gi gtam rgyud sogs kyang yod la /
gna' dus rgya gar gyi skad yig saM skr-i ta'i sgra rig pa dang /
gtan tshigs rig pa /
snyan ngag sogs gsal bshad byed pa'i mchan 'grel skor gyi rtsom rig yang mi nyung ba zhig yod pa red /
de dag khyon yongs kyi grangs 'bor ji tsam yod pa ni re re bzhin brjod kyis mi lang ngo / /
gong gsal rig gnas shul bzhag 'di dag ni bod kyi sangs rgyas chos lugs dang bod rigs kyi rig gzhung la brtag dpyad byed rgyur blangs na rdzogs rgyu med pa dang spyad na 'dzad mtha' med pa'i bang mdzod cig yin pas rang cag gis brtsi mthong chen po byed 'os pa zhig red /
gsung 'bum skor gyi rtsom rig ni bka' bstan 'gyur gyi khongs su ma gtogs pa'i dpe rnying rtsom rig gi grub cha gtso bo zhig yin la bod yig dpe rnying gi bcud lta bu red /
dus rabs bco brgyad pa'i mjug la klong rdol bla ma ngag dbang blo bzang gis <<bka' gdams pa dang dge lugs pa'i bla ma rags rim gyi gsung 'bum mtshan tho>> bsgrigs pa de'i nang la gsung 'bum khag bzhi bcu tsam las /
bu ston rin chen grub dang /
rje tsong kha pa sogs mkhas dbang kha shas kyi gsung 'bum le tshan dpe tho zhib phra tsam dang /
de min mdor bsdus shig bkod 'dug cing /
dus rabs bcu dgu pa'i dkyil la drung chen shes rab rgya mtshos <<dpe rgyun dkon pa 'ga' zhig gi tho yig don gnyer yid kyi kun dA bzhad pa'i zla 'od 'bum gyi snye ma>> zhes pa bsgrigs pa de'i nang sde tshan bcu gnyis su phyes te gsung 'bum khag dgu bcu'i mtshan tho bkod 'dug lor bla brang bkra shis 'khyil du snum par thog bkod pa'i <<bla brang dgon pa'i dpe cha spyi'i dkar chag>> nang la sde khag che ba bcu bdun bgos shing /
gsung 'bum skor la mkhas dbang yi dpe tho bkod 'dug bod rigs kyi rig gnas bya gzhag shul 'dzin dang dar spel byed rgyu dang /
mi rigs khag gi rig gnas brje res byed rgyu /
thun mong du dar rgyas phun sum tshogs pa yong bar skul spel gtong rgyu /
mi rigs kyi tshan rig zhib 'jug gi bya ba byed rgyu /
dngos po dang bsam blo'i dpal yon gnyis kyi 'dzugs skrun byed rgyu bcas la zhabs 'degs zhu ba'i ched du 'di ga dpe mdzod khang gi bod yig dpe rnying legs sgrig byed pa'i rmang gzhi'i thog 'di gar bzhugs yod pa'i bod yig dpe rnying nang gsung 'bum skor gyi dkar chag zhib phra bsgrigs nas /
thog mar deb 'di bsgrigs pa yin /
deb 'di'i nang khyon bsdoms mkhas dbang brgya dang brgyad cu tsam gyi gsung 'bum 'dus yod cing /
deb gsum du bgos te rim pas par bskrun byed rgyu yin /
gsung 'bum skor gyi dkar chag 'di ni dpe cha dang dpyad gzhi sogs 'tshol bde ched bod rgya skad gnyis shan sbyar byas nas bkod yod pa'i lag cha lta bu'i deb cig yin /
'on kyang 'di ga'i dpe mdzod khang du yod pa'i dpe cha'i gnas tshul mtshon pa tsam zhig las /
bod yig dpe rnying nang gsung 'bum skor gyi rtsom rig yod do cog gi rnam pa yongs su mtshon mi thub /
bod yig dpe rnying rnams la dpe ming rgyas pa dang bsdus pa gnyis yod cing /
dpe ming rgyas pa de dag ha cang ring bas blor nges dka' ba dang /
lhag par du thun mong ma yin pa'i khyad chos dmigs bsal re yod la /
tha snyad dang mngon brjod rnam grangs mang bas klog pa pos go dka' ba zhig dang /
dpe ming kha byang bsdus pa de dag ni ming 'dra ba mang bas dkar chag bzo dus rnyog 'dzing yong sla ba zhig red /
der brten dpe cha'i kha byang yongs rdzogs ji bzhin bshus nas dkar chag bzos yod /
nga tshos ched dmigs kyis rtsom pa po so so'i gnas tshul mdor bsdus re ngo sprod zhus yod /
de'i nang rtsom pa po 'ga' zhig gi rnam thar sogs dpyad gzhi 'dzom po zhig ma rnyed stabs gsan yig dang /
mjug byang /
bla brgyud sogs 'brel yod dpyad gzhir brten nas ngo sprod byas yod /
rtsom pa po 'ga' zhig la dpyad gzhi ma rnyed stabs bar stong la 'jog dgos byung /
nga tshos bod rgya shan sbyar gyi dkar chag che gras 'di 'dra zhig bsgrigs pa thengs dang po yin pas nyams myong mi 'dang ba dang /
mi shugs mi 'dang ba /
bod kyi rig gnas khyab khongs kyi yon tshad dma' ba bcas la brten skyon dang nor 'khrul yod nges la mkhas dbang rnam pa dang /
klog pa po rnams kyis mdzub ston gnang ba'i re 'dun zhu rgyu bcas / /
mi rigs dpe mdzod khang nas /
lo'i zla par /
dkar chag sgrig tshul skor gyi gsal bshad /
dkar chag 'di ni gsung 'bum gyi rtsom pa po so so'i mtshan zur las dras pa'i ka kha'i go rim ltar bsgrigs yod /
grub mtha'i bla brgyud dang sku rabs grags che ba rnams de'i go rim ji bzhin mtshon par byed ched /
spyi ming bkod yod pa dper na karma pa sku phreng rim byon gyi gsung 'bum la !!ka yig'' dang /
tA la'i sku phreng rim byon gyi gsung 'bum la !!tA yig'' sa skya'i gong ma lnga'i gsung 'bum la !!sa yig'' bcas gzhir bzhag nas ka mad rim pa ltar bsgrigs shing /
bla brgyud dang sku rabs so so'i nang khul gyi rtsom pa po'i mtshan ni sku phreng snga phyi'i go rim ltar bsgrigs yod /
gsung 'bum tshar rer par ma'am bris ma gang rung zhig la cha bzhag nas /
sngon gyi glegs bam dang dpe tshan bsgrigs tshul sor bzhag thog par gzhi gzhan la'ang zur bltas byas te /
ma tshang ba rnams kha skong byas yod /
dper na dngul chu dbyangs can grub pa'i rdo rje'i gsung 'bum ga pod nang ang grangs rtags can rnams ni par gzhi gzhan nas drangs pa'i rtags yin /
'ga' zhig ni logs su bsgrigs yod /
par gzhi mi 'dra ba'i nang la nang don 'dra yang kha byang mi 'dra ba yod pa dper na tsong kha pa'i gsung 'bum kha pod nang la lha sa'i par mar lam rim la <<skyes bu gsum gyi nyams su blangs pa'i byang chub lam gyi rim pa bzhugs so>> zhes 'khod pa dang /
sde dge'i par mar <<rgyal ba'i gsung rab thams cad kyi snying po'i gnad bsdus te gtan la phab pa byang chub lam gyi rim pa bzhugs so>> zer ba lta bu kha byang mi 'dra ba rnams so sor bkod yod /
nang don mi 'dra yang kha byang mtshungs pa dper na <<kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal po rig 'dzin rtags can nang gi par gsal ba de rigs kyang so sor bkod yod /
nang don 'dra la kha byang yang de tsam dbye ba cher med pas dbye 'byed sla tsam yod pa rnams gcig gis 'thus pa byas yod /
po ti so so'i gdong tshal la yod pa'i ang grangs dang kha bskong du drangs pa'i dpe tshan so so'i gsham la yod pa'i ang grangs ni rang re'i dpe mdzod khang gi pod grangs mtshon byed yin /
dpe tshan gsham gyi rtags yod pa 'di ni po ti de'i nang gi dpe tshan gyi go rim mtshon pa'i ang grangs yin /
rtags kyi rgyab la yod pa'i ang ki de ni shog grangs mtshon byed yin /
dkar chag pha bong kha pa bde chen snying po'i gsung 'bum /
... phag mo gru pa rdo rje rgyal po'i gsung 'bum /

pha bong kha pa bde chen snying po'i gsung 'bum / /
par ma /
ka khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal bzang po'i gsung 'bum pod ka pa'i dkar chag bzhugs so / /
rigs brgya'i khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo rje pha bong kha pa'i gsan yig bsam 'phel nor bu'i do shal las dbang rkyang gi skor phyogs gcig tu bkod pa bzhugs so / /
rigs brgya'i khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo rje pha bong kha pa'i gsan yig bsam 'phel nor bu'i do shal las dbang khrid sbrags ma'i skor phyogs gcig tu bkod pa bzhugs so / /
rigs brgya'i khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo rje pha bong kha pa'i gsan yig bsam 'phel nor bu'i do shal las /
lung khrid sna tshogs skor phyogs gcig tu bkod pa bzhugs so / /
rigs brgya'i khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo rje pha bong kha pa'i gsan yig bsam 'phel nor bu'i do shal las /
lung rkyang gi skor phyogs gcig tu bkod pa bzhugs so / /
par ma /
kha khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal bzang po'i gsung 'bum pod kha pa'i dkar chag bzhugs so / /
rigs brgya'i khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo rje pha bong kha pa'i gsan yig bsam 'phel nor bu'i do shal las rjes gnang gi skor phyogs gcig tu bkod pa bzhugs so / /
rigs brgya'i khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo rje pha bong kha pa'i gsan yig bsam 'phel nor bu'i do shal las be'u bum skor phyogs gcig tu bkod pa bzhugs so / /
zab lam bla ma mchod pa bde stong dbyer med ma dpal 'khor lo sdom pa dang 'brel ba'i rnal 'byor nyams su len tshul gyi cho ga nag 'gros su bkod pa zhar byung dang bcas pa snyan brgyud bdud rtsi'i zil thigs zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
zab lam bla ma mchod pa 'jigs byed dang 'brel bar nyams su len tshul gyi 'don chog nag 'gros su bkod pa snyan brgyud bdud rtsi'i zegs ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
snyan brgyud dbang bzhi rgyas pa len tshul gyi / /
chog sgeg thabs mkhas 'phrul gyi dga' ston bzhugs / /
zab lam bla ma mchod pa bde stong dbyer med ma dang grub rgyal lugs kyi tshe sgrub sbrags ma'i sgo nas zhing khyad par can la brtan bzhugs 'bul tshul rtag brtan rdo rje'i re khA zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bla ma'i rnal 'byor byin rlabs 'dod dgu'i gter mdzod sogs bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi rim pa phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa bzhugs so / /
khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa'i gsung las /
bla brgyud gsol 'debs sogs kyi skor phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa bzhugs so / /
zab lam dga' ldan lha brgya ma'i rnal 'byor nyams su len tshul snyan brgyud zhal shes lhag par bkod pa'i man ngag rin chen gter gyi bang mdzod ces bya ba bzhugs so / /
dge ldan snyan brgyud kyi man ngag las byung ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor dga' ldan lha brgya mar grags pa bzhugs so / /
srad rgyud lugs kyi dga' ldan lha brgya ma'i 'pho khrid 'don chog dang bcas pa skal bzang dga' ldan bgrod pa'i them skas zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
lam gyi rtsa ba bshes gnyen bsten tshul myong khrid du stsal skabs kyi zin bris grub gnyis 'dod pa 'jo ba'i dpag bsam yongs 'du'i snye ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rje btsun bla ma co ne paN+Dita rin po che'i zhal snga nas /
sngags rim chen mo'i bshad lung nos skabs kyi gsung bshad zin bris tho tsam du bkod pa bzhugs so / /
sgrub sde dge rgyas theg mchog gling gi spong ba pa rnams kyi nyams bzhes khrims su bca' ba'i yi ge ngo mtshar bdud rtsi'i dga' ston zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
par ma /
ga khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal bzang po'i gsung 'bum pod ga pa'i dkar chag bzhugs so / /
rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed rim dngos grub rgya mtsho dang /
rdzogs rim rim lnga gsal sgron gnyis kyi gsung bshad nos pa'i zin tho 'ga' zhig phyogs gcig tu bkod pa bzhugs so / /
'dus pa 'phags lugs kyi sgrub thabs mdor bsdus mchog gi dga' ston zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs bdud las rnam rgyal gyi ngag 'don nag 'gros blo dman las dang po ba la khyer bde bar bkod pa bzhugs so / /
'jigs mdzad dpa' bo gcig pa'i bdag bskyed cung bsdus te nyams su len tshul bzhugs so / /
bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs shin tu mdor bsdus dang /
bdag 'jug shin tu bsdus pa bcas bzhugs so / /
rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa'i gsung dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dpa' bo gcig pa'i las rung gi bsnyen pa bya tshul dang /
dpa' gcig gi bsnyen chen zin tho thun mong min pa a mdo bde yangs pa'i gsung dang rje nyid kyi gsung zin bka' rgya ma /
drug cu drag bsngo /
chab shog mtshams don khag gnyis bcas bzhugs so / /
byin rlabs can du grags pa dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud 'grel sbas don kun gsal gyi bshad lung dang /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bskyed rim gyi phyag zin thor bu bcas bzhugs so / /
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa dril bu lus dkyil gyi bla brgyud gsol 'debs bde chen nye lam dang /
grub pa'i dbang phyug dril bu zhabs lugs kyi bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo sdom pa'i lus dkyil gyi mngon par rtogs pa bde chen rab 'phel bcas bzhugs so / /
grub chen dril bu zhabs lugs bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo sdom pa lus dkyil gyi bum bskyed dang bdag 'jug mdor bsdus nyes ltung dri ma 'khrud pa'i thugs rje'i ga bur chab rgyun zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
grub chen dril bu zhabs lugs bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo sdom pa lus dkyil gyi gzhi bsnyen chen mo'i bsnyen sgrub sbrags ma'i cho ga bklag chog tu bkod pa bzhugs so / /
grub chen dril bu zhabs lugs bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo sdom pa lus dkyil la brten pa'i phyi rol mchod pa bya tshul gyi 'don chog bsod nams mchog gi dga' ston zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i ja mchod rdo rje'i lus kyi mchod sprin bzhugs so / /
'chi med rdo rje'i srog tu sgrub pa'i man ngag kun gyi phul gyur rdo rje bzlas pa'i rlung sbyor bde mchog tshe lha dkar po dang sbrags te nyams su len tshul gyi man ngag snyan brgyud bdud rtsi'i thig le zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bde mchog tshe lha dkar po'i sgo nas yul khyad par can la zhabs brtan 'bul tshul mkha' 'gro bsun bzlog dang bcas pa 'chi med bdud rtsi'i bum bzang zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bcom ldan 'das bde mchog tshe lha dkar po'i tshogs mchod bya tshul dngos grub 'gug pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bcom ldan 'das ma seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i lam rim pa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor nyams su len tshul gyi man ngag dmar bcang lhug par bkod pa tsit+ta ma Ni'i do shal zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
gsang bde 'jigs gsum gyi rim gnyis bka' khrid skabs 'grel gtor 'bul tshul skor dang /
sgyu lus mchod pa sogs kyi phyag bzhes 'khrul med phyogs gcig tu bkod pa bzhugs so / /
par ma /
nga khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa dpal bzang po'i gsung 'bum pod nga pa'i dkar chag bzhugs so / /

rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma nA ro mkha' spyod dbang mo'i sgrub thabs bde chen nye lam las bsdus te bsgom tshul nag 'gros su bkod pa bzhugs so / /
rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma nA ro mkha' spyod dbang mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bde chen dga' ston zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma nA ro mkha' spyod dbang mo'i bsnyen sgrub las gsum gyi lag len nag 'gros su bkod pa skal bzang mkha' spyod bgrod pa'i them skas zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /

rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma nA ro mkha' spyod dbang mo'i sgo nas 'jig rten pa'i me lha thab tu 'gugs pa'i bsnyen pa'i bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bya tshul drang srong dgyes pa'i mchod sbyin zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma nA ro mkha' spyod dbang mo la brten pa'i sin+d+hu ra'i sgrub pa'am bsnyen sgrub sbrags ma'i 'don sgrigs mkha' spyod zhing gi 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma nA ro mkha' spyod dbang mo'i bsnyen pa'i bcu cha chen mo'i sbyin sreg bya tshul gyi 'don chog lhug par spel pa don yod 'phrul gyi zhags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
mkha' spyod bgrod pa'i man ngag gser chos thun mong ma yin pa'i zhal shes chig brgyud ma bzhugs so / /
rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma nA ro mkha' spyod dbang mo'i tshogs mchod mdor bsdus zag med dgyes rgu'i dga' ston zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /

lag mchod bya tshul bcas bzhugs so / /

dgung lo nyer lnga la bya 'dul ba 'dzin pa chen pos mkhan po dang /
stod lung rgya dmar bas slob dpon /
ar gyis gsang ston mdzad thog dge 'dun grangs tshang gi dbus su bsnyen par rdzogs shing /
mkhan slob de dag gi drung du 'dul ba'i gzhung lugs la shin tu mkhas par mdzad /
snyan grags phyogs kun khyab /
de nas dmar chos kyi rgyal po dang byang sems zla ba rgyal mtshan /
dpal chen rga lo pa /
sa chen kun dga' snying po /
bu sgom /
jo mo lha rje sogs la gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i chos skor mang po gsan /
rab byung gsum pa'i lcags lug lor zhang dang lhan du dwags lha sgam por byon /
zhag bzhi par mnyam med dwags po rin po che mjal /
thun mong ma yin pa'i dad sems lhag par thugs la 'khrungs /
der khong rang gi sngar gyi lo rgyus dang ting 'dzin bzang po yod tshul rnams zhus par /
dwags po rin po ches /
de la yon tan du brtsi'am /
de bas zan rdog 'di tsam zhig mi dga' re zhes phyag gi brda dang bcas gsungs par sngar gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi nyams thug po de hrul gyis zhig der dwags po rin po ches da khyod rang ri pha gir sdod la sems ma bcos par mnyam par zhog gsungs pas /
de ltar mnyam par bzhag ma thag phyag rgya chen po'i don gyi ye shes mngon du gyur /
sgam por lo gsum bzhugs skabs /
rdo rje rgyal po dang /
dus gsum mkhyen pa /
sgom pa shwa ston gsum la grub thob khams pa mi gsum zhes dwags po rin po che'i slob ma'i nang nas mchog tu gyur pa yin /
mnyam med dwags po rin po che dgongs pa rdzogs rjes dwags lha sgam por lo gcig tsam bzhugs nas dgongs rdzogs kyi zhabs tog mdzad /
de nas bla mas lung bstan pa ltar kun tu bzang po'i nags khrod dam phag mo gru zhes pa'i gnas su phebs /
brag kha ba'i btsan pos sbyin bdag bgyis te gdan sa chen po dpal gyi phag mo gru'i dgon gnas btab pas /
gdan sa'i ming bla ma la chags nas phag mo gru pa rdo rje rgyal po zhes brjod /
'gro don dang 'phrin las tshad med rgyas /
slob ma dbu gdugs thob pa lnga brgya 'dus /
'bri gung dang /
stag lung /
'brug pa /
tshal pa /
g.ya' bzang /
khro phu /
dmar g.yel sogs bka' brgyud thams cad kyi chu 'go lta bur gyur te de nas bzung phag gru bka' brgyud shin tu dar bar gyur /
dgung lo zhe dgu nas bzung zla ba yar ngo la sku mtshams dang /
mar ngo la snga dro sku mtshams dang /
phyi dro'i dus zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te slob ma shin tu mang po spel bar mdzad /
phag gru bka' brgyud kyi srol thog mar 'byed par mdzad do / /
de nas dad ldan slob ma rnams la bslab bya legs par gdams nas rab byung gsum pa'i lcags pho stag gi lo zla bdun pa'i tshes nyer lnga la ngo mtshar ba'i bltas du ma dang bcas gzugs sku'i bkod pa chos dbyings su bsdu bar mdzad do / /
khong gi gsung rab ni nged dpe mdzod khang du po ti bzhi bzhugs yod / /
@# / /
phur lcog ngag dbang byams pa'i gsung 'bum / /
par ma /
rtogs brjod rin po che 'dun legs ma'i 'grel ba mkhas pa'i gzhung lam zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rten 'brel bstod pa'i TIk+ka 'od dkar 'phreng ba bzhugs so / /
'jam dpal dbyangs kyis rje bla ma la dngos su gnang ba'i gdams pa mdor bsdus kyi TIk+ka gnad don gsal ba bzhugs so / /
rgyal ba mi pham pa la bstod pa tshangs pa'i cod pan gyi don 'grel tshig don gsal ba bzhugs so / /
yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i don slob dpon seng bzang dang /
phyogs glang gnyis kyi 'chad tshul mdor bsdus sgron gsal bzhugs so / /
sdom pa gsum gyi nyes ltung rags pa ngos bzung nas bshags sdom byed tshul zla ba'i 'od zer bzhugs so / /
bkra shis lhun po'i dka' chen ye shes rgyal mtshan khal kha rje btsun dam pa'i dbu blar phebs nas dpyad pa zhib mo mdzad pa'i dris lan som nyi gcod pa'i ral gri sogs bzhugs so / /
mi dbang bsod nams stobs rgyas la zhal gdams su gnang ba bzhugs so / /
gsung mgur le tshan bcas bzhugs so / /
bla ma'i man ngag skyes bu chen po'i skor bzhugs so / /
byang chub lam rim las brtsams pa'i dris lan bzhugs so / /
'jigs byed gtso rkyang gi mngon rtogs dang /
seng gdong ma'i sgrub thabs zur rgyan dang bcas pa bzhugs so / /
lta ba bkar btags kyi phyag rgya bzhi'i nang nas /
bdag med pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya gtan la 'bebs pa yid kyi gdung sel zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
thig le bcu drug gi chos skor dang sgrol ma bcu gnyis kyi gtor 'bul / /
rje btsun 'jam dpal dbyangs nang sgrub kyi sgrub thabs shes rab snang mdzod ces bya ba bzhugs so / /
sgrol dkar yid bzhin 'khor lo'i bsnyen yig bla ma dam pa'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi dang /
de'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so / /
stag tshang lo tsA ba'i brgal lan rdo rje'i gzegs ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
par ma /
drin can bla ma dge legs rgya mtsho'i rnam par thar pa phyogs tsam brjod pa dge legs char 'bebs zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
byang chub kyi sems la blo sbyong tshul gyi gdams ngag thor bu zin bris su bkod pa bzhugs so / /
rje rin po ches mdzad pa'i gsang 'dus 'jam rdor sgrub thabs 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi dgongs pa gsal ba ngag 'don du bya tshul 'dod 'jo'i bum bzang bzhugs so / /
gsang 'dus 'jam rdor gyi bum pa dang dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang bdag 'jug ngag 'don gyi rim pa dngos grub 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
gsang 'dus 'jam dpal rdo rje'i zhi rgyas kyi sbyin sreg 'dod 'jo'i bum bzang bzhugs so / /
slob dpon chen po ye shes zhabs lugs kyi gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed rim rin chen phreng ba bzhugs so / /
slob dpon chen po ye shes zhabs lugs kyi gsang ba 'dus pa'i rdzogs rim rin chen phreng ba bzhugs so / /
dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed rim dngos grub rgya mtsho'i snying po bzhugs so / /
dpal gsang ba dus pa'i rdzogs rim rim lnga gdan rdzogs kyi snying po bzhugs so / /
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bskyed rim za ma tog gi snying po bzhugs so / /
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rdzogs rim rnal 'byor bzhi nyams su len tshul mdor bsdus zung 'jug gsal ba bzhugs so / /
dpal 'khor lo bde mchog lU i pa'i rim pa dang po'i smar 'khrid zab mo dpal ldan srad rgyud pa'i man ngag zin bris su bkod pa bde chen gsal ba'i dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
grub chen kun tu dge ba'i lugs kyi rdzogs rim rnal 'byor chen po'i dmigs rim skyong tshul mdor bsdus bzhugs so / /
bde mchog lU i pa'i bsnyen pa byed tshul bde chen gsal ba'i snying po bzhugs so / /
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bsnyen yig gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rdor sems kyi bum sgrub dang /
ril sgrub byed tshul gsang 'dus kyi bdag bskyed nas byung ba bzhin bzhugs so / /
par ma /
rigs gsum spyi sgrub kyi bla ma'i rnal 'byor shin tu bsdus pa sogs bzhugs so / /
rdo rje 'chang don yod mkhas grub dpal bzang po'i rnam par thar pa bde gshegs gzhung lam zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i 'khrid nyams su len tshul 'khyer bde gnad don kun gsal bzhugs so / /
snying po don gsum nyung ngu gsal ba bzhugs so / /
rgyal ba byams pa'i thugs rje bskul ba'i gsol 'debs smon lam bzhugs so / /
gsol 'debs bstod tshogs kyi rim pa rnams bzhugs so / /
'dod gsol smon lam gyi rim pa bzhugs so / /
zhabs brtan gsol 'debs kyi rim pa dang sprul sku myur 'byon gsol 'debs le tshan bcas bzhugs so / /
dkar chag gi rim pa du ma dang sku gsung thugs rten bzhengs pa'i smon tshig gi rim pa bzhugs so / /
thang sku'i rgyab yig le tshan dang mchod rdzas gsar bskrun gyi 'dod gsol smon lam gyi rim pa bzhugs so / /
lam 'khrid 'jam dpal zhal lung gi stod smad rnams su blo dman rang la dogs pa ji ltar byung ba rnams bzhugs so / /
grwa sa chen po bzhi dang rgyud pa stod smad chags tshul pad dkar 'phreng ba bzhugs so / /
gtor 'bul gyi rim pa bzhugs so / /
bca' yig gi rim pa thar ba'i them skas zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
paN chen thams cad mkhyen pa chen po'i dogs gcod gsung lan bzhugs so / /
bsngo ba don gnyis phun tshogs sogs bzhugs so / /
rtsom pa po'i lo rgyus nyung bsdus /
phur lcog ngag dbang byams pa ni /
'khrungs yul mdo stod zal mo sgang gi char gtogs chab mdo dang nye ba'i yul tham kha grong sno rom zhes pa de yin /
rus rgyud ni chos rgyal khri srong lde btsan gyi blon po rlangs khams pa go cha zhes pa de yi rigs rgyud rim par brgyud pa las /
sne'u gdong pa'i zhal ngo gdong brag nag zer ba /
'gro mgon chos rgyal 'phags pa'i zhabs phyir khams phyogs su byon pa yul der chags pa'i rigs rgyud las /
rgyal mkhar a nu /
sa sgang sde pa /
dbyi mda' sde pa /
gnas mdo sde pa rnams byung zhing /
gnas mdo sde ba'i rus brgyud la /
brag dmar a nu /
mgon brtan /
klu mgon rgyal /
lha dbang bcas byung /
lha dbang gi sras la /
a nu 'phags pa dang /
lha 'bum gnyis byung ba'i che ba a nu 'phags pa zhes bya ba yon tan du mas rgyud phyug cing /
dpa' mdzangs rtul phod dang ldan pa de ni rje nyid kyi yab rjer gyur pa dang /
yum ni bkra shis mtsho zhes pa ste 'di'ang bud med skyon dang bral zhing /
yon tan dang ldan pa zhig ste /
yab yum de gnyis la sras bdun yod pa'i nang nas rje 'di ni lnga pa yin la /
rab byung bcu gcig pa'i chu khyi lo la sku bltams /
yab kyis bka' rgyud kyi bla ma grags pa phun tshogs la mtshan gnang bar zhus pas /
bde mchog bsrung zhes gsol /
dgung lo bdun sa 'brug la babs pa'i tshe /
dam pa de nyid kyi khu bo mthu stobs dbang phyug chos skyong rgyal zhes pa de'i drung du yi ge'i klog slob par mdzad /
'bad rtsol cher bskyed byas te shin tu byang bar gyur /
dus de tsam nyid nas skabs 'gar grong chog gi bya ba'ang 'ga' mdzad /
dgung lo bcu gsum shing pho khyi lor khu bo tshe dbang bkra shis kyis sna drangs te /
tshes bco lnga nyin chab mdo byams pa gling du phebs te mdo khams bstan pa'i sgron me 'phags pa lha'i drung du khyim pa'i rtags thams cad mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin dor nas na bza' ngur smrig gsol te /
dge tshul gyi sdom pa bzhes /
ngag dbang byams pa zhes pa'i mtshan gsol /
'khrungs gzhis nas phebs khar yab kyis kyang rang re tham kha ba'i mis /
chab mdo pho skyes pa'i lo rgyus med pas /
khyed kyang tshul mthun ma byung na mig gis mthong sar ma 'ong zhig ces pa'i mngags cha nan can mdzad pa'ang thugs la bcangs te /
grwa tshang de'i 'don cha ji snyed pa thams cad dang gar 'cham dbyangs rol la sogs pa thams cad ring po ma lon par thugs su chud /
dus gtor skabs gar 'cham sogs kyang mdzad /
dgung lo bcu bzhi shing phag pa'i dus su rab 'byams pa bsam gtan gyis thal skad bzang po dang bcas te bgro gleng byas pas gzigs ma thag sku lus kyi ba spu thams cad g.yos /
ci nas kyang ngang tshul de lta bu rgyal ba'i gsung rab rgya mtsho lta bu'i pha rol tu son par bya'o snyam pa thugs la shar /
dbus phyogs su thon khar thon phyag la byon skabs 'phags pa lhas sngar lha thog sbyin pa zer ba legs tshad cig yod pa grwa sar sdug bsran ma thub par byang du grong chog la song bas chos 'go tsam yang ma thon /
de 'dra ma song bar nyam gang chung sdod gang tshugs steng nas slob gnyer mthar phyin par byas /
slar yang yul du 'ong nas mig rgyan la phan pa zhig gyis zhes bslab bya bstsal /
de nas grogs po bdun tsam dang lhan du dgung lo bco lnga pa'i me byi lor dbus su phebs /
ser byes grwa tshang du bzhugs /
mkhas pa'i dbang po ngag dbang rgya mtsho dang yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen blo bzang rgyal mtshan gnyis yongs 'dzin du bsten nas bsdus grwa gsan sbyong mdzad /
dgung lo bcu drug me glang lo nas phar phyin sbyong ba'i dbu tshugs /
bya bral dge bshes blo bzang chos 'phel bsten te /
dgung lo bcu bdun la rigs chung gi tshogs langs shig gnang /
rtsod grwar 'bad pa las 'tsho ba'i yo byad ched du gnyer ba'i rtsol ba cung zad tsam yang med par dam pa'i chos kyi don du thos bsam la nan tan kho na mdzad /
gsol zas kyi rigs shin tu dkon par gyur te gsol ja bskol ba sogs kyi yo langs lta zhog gsol rtsam yang gsol rgyu med pa'i ngang nas phyag dpe lta sbyong mdzad de <<phar phyin gyi thal phreng zur bkol bzhi>> dang bcas pa dang <<dbu ma skal bzang mgul rgyan>> yongs rdzogs thugs la bzung /
gzhan yang paN chen bde legs nyi ma'i <<'dul ba gzhi stod smad>> <<mdzod rtsa>> kun gzigs lnga pa chen pos mdzad pa'i <<chos mngon rin chen 'dren pa'i shing rta>> sogs thugs la bzung /
de skabs gsol zas skya la na bza' hrul ba byed bzhin bzhugs pas /
gtsang pa chos grags zer ba des sems kyis ma bzod nas rje 'di spyan drangs /
kho pa rang la cha rkyen bzang po med mod kyang /
gsol ja yang yang drangs pa dang /
lho pa rab 'byams pa blo bzang sbyin pa zer ba chas ka dga' rab yod pa des kyang gsol ja yang yang drangs /
sku sham shin tu hrul bar rgyal byed dge slong rig 'dzin zer ba zhig gis sham thabs rnying se ba zhig phul /
dbu ma'i 'dzin grwar phebs skabs de yang zad nas bgro gleng mdzad skabs zhabs pus gnyis sngo hreng hreng byed par gyur dus bsam blo dka' bcu ba bsam gtan lhun grub zer ba'i mkhas pa zhig gis nang du spyan drangs te ja bzang po dang sku sham bcas phul zhing /
rgyal ba tshangs dbyangs rgya mtsho se rar phebs skabs ser smad dge bshes rgya rong dbon chung dang mnyam du bzhugs gral chen mor tshogs langs mdzad pas kun gyis bsngags brjod mdzad /
dgung grangs nyer gcig chu pho rta la gling bsre'i grwa skor mdzad pas thams cad kyis dga' ba'i ca co ci yang sgrog par gyur to / /
dgung grangs nyer gsum par gtsang du phebs te shing pho sprel lo la paN chen blo bzang ye shes kyis mkhan slob zung 'brel dang /
mkhas pa'i dbang po yongs 'dzin bsod nams grags pas gsang ste ston pa'i slob dpon mdzad cing /
kha skong gi dge 'dun grangs tshang ba'i dbus su dge slong gi sdom pa yang dag par bzhes /
slar yang dbus phyogs su phebs nas thos bsam la brtson par mdzad de rje sgrub khang pa'i bka' dgongs ltar /
dgung grangs nyer lngar phebs dus me khyi bod zla dang por smon lam chen mor grwa skor mdzad /
de skabs dge 'dun tshang ma mchog tu mos shing /
dang ba dang /
'dun pa /
spro ba rnams phan tshun 'gran pa bzhin du gyur /
smon lam grwa skor zin rjes sgrub khang pa la yang yang dgongs skor zhus /
mthar phur bu lcog tu rab 'byams pa blo bzang sbyin pas grogs mdzad de chos 'dul ba'i gzhung dang mthun pa'i spyil bu zhig brtsigs te phur bu lcog tu gtan bzhugs gnang /
rje sgrub khang pa'i mdun chos bka' mtha' yas pa gsan /
dgung lo so gcig pa chu 'brug lor khong gi bla ma sgrub khang pa sku gshegs par thugs skyo ba tshad med ngang gshegs chos zab rgyas bsgrubs /
dgung lo sum cu so gsum shing rta nas gzhan la gsung chos gnang ba'i 'go brtsams /
de nas lo ltar gsung chos chag med gnang zhing /
dang po gsung chos gnang skabs skya ser bzhi bcu tsam /
rjes nas rim gyis 'phel rgyas phyin te phyis su gsung chos gnang thengs re la gsan mkhan gyi slob ma stong kha shas re 'dus pa byung yod /
khong dgung lo bzhi bcu zhe brgyad la phebs pa sa mo bya lo la /
chab mdo 'phags pa lha'i cod pan bzhes par gdan drangs /
bsu bar byed mkhan yang lha sar 'byor bar brten chab mdor phebs /
zla ba bcu par chab mdo byams pa gling du 'byor /
'phags pa lha'i cod pan bzhes te chos bka' mang po gnang /
zla ba bdun tsam bzhugs rjes lcags khyi lo zla ba bcu pa'i tshes nyer gnyis la byang lam brgyud de dbus lha ldan phyogs su bteg dgung lo brgyad cur phebs pa lcags sbrul lo la gong ma chan lung gis tA la'i 'jam dpal rgya mtsho'i yongs 'dzin du bskos /
spyir khong gi slob ma ni /
lcang skya rol rdor /
pan chen dpal ldan ye shes /
zhog don yod mkhas grub sogs chos phan tshun gnang re byed pa'i slob ma dang /
rgyal tshab de mo sprul sku /
'jam bzhad sprul sku /
rgyal sras sprul sku sogs bla sprul mang po dang de min gyi slob ma mtha' yas pa yod cing /
skabs der /
gtsang bkras lhun dang dbus se 'bras dge gsum bcas su bka' chos gnang mkhan gtso bor gyur /
gser gyi bka' 'gyur bzhengs te phal cher grub /
chab kyi snyun bzhes sku lus skrangs /
dbugs 'tshangs /
sku gzugs lci zhing gsung yang 'byon dka' bar gyur /

bu ston gyi gsung 'bum / /
par ma /
ka bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka' 'bum ka pa'i dkar chag bzhugs so / /
mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bsdus pa'i rgyud go sla'i mchan bcas bzhugs so / /
'jig rten khams kyi le'u'i 'grel bshad dri ma med pa'i 'od mchan bcas bzhugs so / /
par ma /
kha bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka' 'bum kha pa'i dkar chag bzhugs so / /
nang gi le'u'i 'grel mchan bzhugs so / /
dbang gi le'u'i 'grel mchan bzhugs so / /
sgrub thabs kyi le'u'i 'grel mchan bzhugs so / /
par ma /
ga bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka' 'bum ga pa'i dkar chag bzhugs so / /
ye shes kyi le'u'i 'grel mchan bzhugs so / /
dpal sbyor ba yan lag drug gi rgyud bzhugs so / /
bla ma dam pa rnams la gsol 'debs kyi dpe le tshan brgyad pa bzhugs so / /
sbyor ba yan lag drug gi sngon 'gro'i rim pa bzhugs so / /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dbang gong ma chen po'i cho ga dbang don rab gsal bzhugs so / /
sbyor ba yan lag drug gi man ngag rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gsal ba zhes bya ba las sor bsam gyi khrid bzhugs so / /
sbyor drug man ngag rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gsal ba zhes bya ba las srog rtsol dang 'dzin pa'i khrid bzhugs so / /
sbyor drug man ngag rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gsal ba zhes bya ba las rjes dran dang ting 'dzin gyi khrid bzhugs so / /
rgyud gsum gyi don gtan la dbab pa gcer mthong ngo shes zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
sbyor ba yan lag drug pa'i 'khrul 'khor bzhugs so / /
dbang mdor bstan gyi sa bcad bzhugs so / /
dbang mdor bstan pa'i rnam bshad bsdus pa'i snying po rab tu gsal ba bzhugs so / /
par ma /
nga bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka' 'bum nga pa'i dkar chag bzhugs so / /
rgyud sde'i zab don sgo 'byed rin chen gces pa'i lde mig ces bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bsdus don dri med 'od kyi rgyan bzhugs so / /
mdor bsdus dang po'i Ti ka snying po snang ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bshad thabs nges don snye ma bzhugs so / /
'gal spong bzhugs pa lags / /
rigs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnal 'byor ma mchod pa'i cho ga bzhugs so / /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i las brgyad pa brgyad kyi cho ga bzhugs so / /
'dod pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'i lde mig bzhugs so / /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bshad thabs sgra rig mkhas pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsis kyi bstan bcos mkhas pa rnams dga' bar byed pa bzhugs so / /
lnga bsdus gza' lnga bzhugs so / /
gza' lnga'i rkang rtsis bzhugs / /
sna tshogs yum gyi 'brum srung bzhugs so / /
go la'i rnam gzhag bzhugs so / /
dus sbyor gyi dris lan bzhugs / /
gsol 'debs thar pa'i lam ston ma bzhugs so / /
par ma /

yab yum de gnyis kyis sras bltams ma thag tu mtshan mkhan la bstan pas /
bsngags brjod dang bcas g.yung drung sangs rgyas skyid ces btags /
gces par bskyangs nas dgung grangs lngar phebs pa na /
mkhas grub du ma'i bsti gnas gyam bsam gtan gling gi dgon par klog pa thos bsam gyi bya bar zhugs /
klog sbyong la thogs pa med pa'i shes rab kyi rtsal brdol bas /
hor dka' bzhi pa seng ge rgyal mtshan dang /
dge bshes sgrub pa dpal sogs mkhas dbang mang pos bstod bsngags kyi me tog lan brgyar gtor /
dgung lo bdun par phebs pa na /
gyam bsam gtan gling gi dgon par phebs /
zhang grags pa rgyal mtshan drung du gtsug phud phul te rab tu byung zhing dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa blangs /
mtshan sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan gsol /
skabs der bstan pa'i sbyin bdag si tu chos kyi rin chen gyis khong dbon zhang gnyis shel dkar gyi khab tu gdan drangs /
byis par nyams sad pa'i slad du si tu pas dbon po sgom zhig mdzod dang zhes bskul ba na /
dbon pos ras rkyang gi chos gos srab po gcig pu las ma bsnams par zhabs dkyil mo dkrungs bcas te bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pas /
dgun gyi grang ngar shin tu che ba la'ang ji mi snyam par rab tu zhi ba'i spyod pa des /
si tu pa ha las shing der gnas pa'i skye bo kun dad pa'i spu long g.yo /
de nas dpal e'i dgon par byon nas /
zhang grags pa rgyal mtshan drung nas dge tshul gyi sdom pa mnos /
mtshan chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes pa gnang /
chos sde de nyid du tshad ma smra ba la zla dang bral ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyi rdo rje slob dpon du bsten nas /
tshad ma rnam 'grel sbyong ba'i dbu btsugs /
dpang TIka chen mo dang /
lo chen grags pa'i TIka chen yongs su rdzogs par thugs su chud cing /
slob dpon gyi zhal las thos pa'i mkhas dbang gzhan dag gi legs bshad dag gis kyang mgrin pa brgyan par mdzad /
yun mi ring bar tshad ma'i rig pa mthar phyin par gyur /
dgung lo bcu drug par dpal sa skya'i gdan sa chen por byon nas tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi grwa skor mdzad /
rigs smra mang po'i yid dbang 'phrog cing /
snyan grags kyi ba dan kun tu g.yo /
shes rab kyi lha la gsol ba btab pas /
lha mo dbyangs can mas rjes su bzung /
mtshan dbyangs can dga' ba zhes grags /
kha ba'i ljongs kyi snyan dngags smra ba kun gyi rtser son /
thub pa'i dbang po la mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas bstod pa /
'jam dbyangs bstod pa brgya pa /
gzhon nu nor bzang gi rtogs brjod sogs snyan dngags kyi bstan bcos mang po brtsams /
dgung na gzhon dus yin yang rnam par g.yeng ba'i go skabs nam yang med par rgyal ba'i gsung rab mchis so cog gi dgongs pa ma lus thugs su chud pa'i thugs mdun rgyun du bcangs te /
dpal e'i chos sder dpang lo chen po'i gzim khang du sku mtshams dam par bcad /
rgyal ba'i gsung rab mtha' dag gi dka' ba'i gnad kun la dpyad pa zhib tu mdzad /
thog mar dbu ma'i gzhung lugs yongs kyi gtso bo /
slob dpon klu sgrub kyi gsung dbu ma rtsa ba shes rab kyi dbu ltebs gnyis la nyin zhag brgyad kyi bar du gzigs zhib mdzad /
de nas rim gyis gzhung cha tshang yun ring bar gzigs pas /
dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi dgongs pa zab mo /
rgyal ba rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bzhed pa ma nor ba khong du chud /
slob dpon klu sgrub kyi dgongs 'grel mkhan po sangs rgyas bskyangs dang /
dpal ldan zla ba grags pa rjes 'brangs dang bcas pa'i dbu ma thal 'gyur ba'i slob dpon so so'i bstan bcos rnams dang /
slob dpon legs ldan 'byed dang /
ye shes snying po sogs rang rgyud pa'i slob dpon rjes 'brangs dang bcas pa'i 'grel pa ma lus par gzigs shing khong du chud /
gzhan yang lha dbang blo /
shAkya blo /
chos mchog sogs kyi 'grel ba rnams kyang zhib tu gzigs te /
tshad ma'i gzhung lugs mtha' dag la zhib dpyod mdzad /
rgya bod kyi mkhas dbang rnams kyi dgongs pa mi 'dra ba re re bzhin zhib bsdur dbye zhib mdzad cing /
lta ba ris su miT 'dzin par /
'jigs bral dbu ma'i gdeng thob /
tshad ma'i bstan bcos kun la sbyangs pa mthar phyin /
rig par bya ba'i gnas mtha' dag la gzhan dring mi 'jog pa'i spobs pa tshad med skyes te /
dbus phyogs kyi rtse thang dang gsang phu sogs gdan sa chen po rnams su grwa skor la 'gro ba'i 'dun pa drag po 'khrungs /
bla ma lo chen grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du dbus phyogs su gzhung bcu gsum gyi grwa skor la 'gro rgyu yin pas gnang ba stsal du gsol zhus /
bla mas thugs dogs dang bcas dri ba mdzad rgyur khyod kyis gzhung bcu gsum gyi grwa skor byed pa la /
dbu phar tshad ma sogs kyi rgya bod kyi dgongs 'grel gang dang gang la bltas pa yin gsungs /
khong gis bla ma la gus pa dang bcas te gsol ba /
brag ca ltar gzhan zer kho na zlos par byed pa dang /
rgya bod kyi 'grel ba dag kha ton du 'don par byed pa ni snying po med par mthong ste /
rgya bod kyi gzhung so so'i rtsom pa po rnams kyi dgongs pa 'di dang 'di 'dra ces bshad cing /
gzhung shin tu phra ba rnams la yang rnam grangs du mar bshad de /
don gyi gnad shin tu dka' ba'i grub mtha' thun mong dang thun mong min pa'i gnad rnams kyang shin tu gsal bar phye nas rang stobs kho nas bshad pa rgyas par zhus pa dang /
gangs ri'i khrod kyi mkhas pa dag gis gsungs tshul nor ba dang ma nor ba'i khyad par 'di dang 'di'o zhes rnam par phye ste zhus pas /
zhang grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis thugs dgyes pa chen pos /
bod du sngar ma grags pa'i legs bshad phul byung 'di dag dbus gtsang gi mkhas dbang rnams kyi snyan lam du song na ci ma rung dgongs nas /
dbus su grwa skor la 'gro chog pa'i gnang ba bstsal to / /
de nas dpal e'i gtsug lag khang chen por yab sras gnyis po zhag bdun gyi bar sku mtshams bcad de /
rgya bod kyi gzhung lugs yongs la dri ba dris lan mang du byas mthar /
gzhon nu nyid shel dkar du phebs te zla ba gsum gyi bar dpe mtshams bzhugs /
slar yang rgya gzhung rnams la zhib tu gzigs /
de nas gyam bsam gtan gling du zla ba bdun gyi bar dpe mtshams bcad /
de nas dgung lo nyer gsum par slob ma bco lnga tsam gyi 'khor dang bcas dbus kyi phyogs su grwa skor la phebs /
de dus khong gi mtshan gzhung lugs 'bum phrag brgya pa zhes grags /
<<rnam thar ngo mtshar rgya mtsho>> bris mar dgung lo nyi shu dbus su grwa skor la phebs par bshad dbus su phebs pa'i lam gyi rim pa rnams su nyin mo dpyod ldan gyi mkhas pa dag la 'bel ba'i bka' mchid mdzad cing /
gang dang gang du phebs pa de dang der nyams 'gyur sna tshogs ldan pa'i snyan dngags bris nas me long ma'i brjod bya mtha' dag gsal bar ston pa'i bstan bcos yid kyi shing rta zhes bya ba brtsams /
de nas thog mar dpal rtse thang gi chos grwa chen por phebs par nye ba na /
dpang lo chen po'i yang dbon /
byis pa'i dus nas rgyal ba'i gsung rab mtha' dag la rang stobs kyis rnam par dpyad pa'i spobs pa thogs pa med pa zhig grwa skor la lhags so zhes pa'i snyan grags kyis khyab /
der 'dus sde rgya mtsho lta bus bsu ba dang bcas rtse thang gi gdan sa chen por phebs /
de'i sang nyin par gdan sa pa chen po byang chub rdo rjes thog drangs /
dge ba'i bshes gnyen stong phrag mang po 'dus pa'i dbus su /
bag tsha ba dang zhum pa med par rig pa'i gnas kun la bshad pa mdzad pa'i dbu btsugs /
tshad ma rnam 'grel dang /
phar phyin /
'dul ba mdo rtsa /
mngon pa kun las btus sogs nas rig gter dang dbu ma rgyan gnyis bcas gzhung pod bco lnga'i bshad pa mdzad /
rtse thang gi gdan sa pas gtsos dge ba'i bshes gnyen kun gyis dgyes pa chen pos bsngags brjod mdzad /
de nas yar klungs kyi gnas khyad 'phags khra 'brug dang dgon thang 'bum mo che sogs su gnas mjal mdzad cing /
gnas bstod kyi tshigs su bcad pa snyan ngag gi lam nas drangs pa phul /
gdan sa thel du yang mjal bar phebs /
gdan sa chen po dpal ldan gsang phu ru 'byor nye ba na /
slob dpon kong po dpon slob lnga bcu lhag gis gsang la'i rtse mo nas spos phor gyis bsus te spyan drangs /
de'i tshe gangs ri'i khrod kyi rigs smra'i gtsug rgyan g.yag mi pham chos kyi rgyal po dpon slob rnams kyang sngar nas gsang phur phebs zin pa dang khel /
g.yag gis gsang phu'i gdan sa pa gnyis dang /
khong dpon slob spyan drangs nas gsol ja zhig phul ba'i skabs su /
da ni slob dpon dpon po pa 'di /
dgung grangs dang po ti grangs mnyam zer chog pa 'dug nged dpal ldan sa skya la dge bshes mkhas pa 'di 'dra yong ba ni /
shin tu ngo mtshar ro zhes bsngags par mdzad cing /
tshad ma rigs gter gyi skor la dri ba dris lan mang du mdzad /
rang rig la yul yod med dang /
ka bum rtag pa yin min sogs la rtsod pa mdzad /
phyogs rgyal pas thal ba ldog tu med pa 'phangs pas /
gsang phu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshang ma ha las par gyur /
de nas bde ba can dang chos 'khor gling gi chos sde rnams su byon nas bshad pa rgya cher mdzad /
gzhung bcu phrag gi grwa skor byed pa'i srol thog mar btsugs /
rim gyis bteg 'phan yul brgyud stag lung thang du byon /
stag lung bkra shis dpal brtsegs mjal /
na ro chos drug dang do ha skor gsum sogs gdams ngag khyad par can mang po zhus /
der stag lung lo tsA ba shAkya bzang pos khong nyid kyi gzim spyil du gdan drangs /
lo tsA ba sku na shin tu smin yang /
bzhugs gdan las bzhengs te /
g.yas g.yon du gzhan gyis bskyor bar brten nas bsu ba'i bkod pa mdzad /
bu ston rin po che'i dngos slob lo tsA ba de'i spyan sngar rnam sras kyi rjes gnang sogs zhus par ma tshad /
legs bshad kyi 'brel mchid mang du mdzad /
skabs de dag tu bar bar rnams su snyan dngags kyi bstan bcos padma dkar po'i chun po /
don rgyan gsal ba'i me long bcas rgya bod du snyan grags kyis khyab pa rnams brtsams /
de nas dbus kyi grwa skor mthar phyin nas yar bteg dpal shel dkar gyi chos grwa chen por zhang grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis mkhan po mdzad /
red mda' ba gzhon nu blo gros kyis las slob mdzad /
bla ma bsam rin pas gsang ste ston pa'i slob dpon mdzad de dge 'dun grangs tshang dbus su bsnyen rdzogs kyi sdom pa yang dag par mnos /
'gro ba lha dang bcas pa'i mchod gnas su gyur /
zhang grags pa'i spyan sngar rgya bod kyi bstan bcos sngar ma gsan pa mang po gsan /
lo chen byang chub rtse mo'i slob ma skad gnyis smra ba nam mkha' bzang po dang /
lo tsA ba shes rab dpal las brda sprod rig pa'i gzhung lugs chen po ka lA pa dang tsan+d+ra pa cha lag dang bcas pa gsan /
rgyal ba'i sras po thogs med zhabs kyi sras kyi thu bo rgya ma pa yon tan 'od las theg pa chen po'i blo sbyong nyams khrid rnams gsan te mdo sde'i phyogs kyi bka' bstan rab 'byams la gsan pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad /
rtsa ba'i bla ma lo chen grags pa'i zhal bkod ltar /
dpal e'i gdan sa chen por seng ge'i khrir mnga' gsol /

shel dkar /
gyam phu ru bcas kyi gdan khrir bzhugs ring rgya bod kyi gzhung lugs tshang ma la dad pa kho nas gzhan zer lad zlos byed pa min par blo gros dang spobs pa tshad med sgo nas legs nyes blang dor mdzad de bshad pa mdzad /
gzur gnas mkhas dbang kun gyis bstod bsngags mdzad pa ma tshad /
dbus gtsang gi yon tan la don gnyer can tshang ma khong gi bshad grwar 'dus /
mkhas grub gnyis ldan gyi slob bu grangs med spel /
bka' bstan mang po'i 'grel ba bcu phrag mang po brtsams te sngon chad mdud rgya ma bkrol ba'i dka' gnad mang po thub pa'i dgongs ltar bkral /
gsang sngags kyi skor la gsan bsam mdzad tshul ni /

de min sa skya pa yab sras /
sa skya'i dbon bsod nams yon tan /

lo chen nam mkha' bzang po /

mnyam med stag phu pa /

ser skya /
rkang mig 'ug pa'i bu sogs mu stegs pa'i grub mtha' kun la mkhas par sbyangs /

bal po /

snyan ngag gi bstan bcos slob dpon dpa' bos mdzad pa'i <<skyes rabs so bzhi pa>> dge ba'i dbang po sras dang bcas pas brtsams pa'i <<rtogs brjod dpag bsam 'khri shing>> dpal rdo rje lhas brtsams pa'i <<'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa brgya pa>> nag mo khol gyis brtsams pa'i <<sprin gyi pho nya>> sogs rgya bod kyi snyan ngag grags che ba tshang mar gzigs te gangs ri'i khrod kyi snyan ngag smra ba kun gyi gtsug rgyan du gyur /

nyi ma sbas pa dang /

ma brtag ma dpyad par ngag skyor lad zlos kho na byed pa'am /
yang na gya tshom du tshang mar zur za byed pa de dra min par /

mi shes shes rlom byed pa dang /

rang phyogs med par pha rol la rgol ba /

yang dag pa rnams dang len thog gong du spel ba zung 'brel mdzad nas /

bsngags brjod tshad med byas /
khong ni bod snga rabs kyi mkhas dbang nang nas rtsom chos mang shos yin la /
'dzam gling khyon la bshad na'ang rtsom chos mang shos kyi gras shig yin /
gsung rab rtsom pa'i tshe /
yi ge pa nyi shu tsam re rang rang gi gnas mi 'chol bar so sor gnas bcug thog chu bo 'bab pa ltar rig pa'i gnas kun rgyun mi chad par bshad cing gsung rab sna mang po zhig dus gcig la mnyam du grub par mdzad /

gsung 'ga'i par byang nang du po ti brgya phrag de snyed kyi /
zer ba sogs po ti brgya phrag brgal ba yod par 'khod pa dang /

ces dang /
byang pa rnam rgyal grags bzang sogs mkhas grub du mas /
bod la snga phyi bar gsum du mkhas grub mchog tu gyur pa gsum byon yod de sngon gyi mkhas grub sa paN /
bar gyi mkhas grub bu ston /

ston pa mya ngan las 'das nas da bar rgyal ba'i gsung rab rig gnas che phra mtha' dag 'chad nyan mdzad cing /
'grel pa brtsams pa 'di 'dra khong ma gtogs su byon ma myong ba yin zer /

btsas ston gzab rgyas zin 'phral gsang sngags rnying ma'i slob dpon rdo rje grags pa la gtad de byin rlabs zhus rjes /
yab kyis rdo rje nag po chen po'i rjes gnang dang byin rlabs mdzad cing /
khye'ur rgyal dbang dpal bzang zhes pa'i ming btags /
byis pa spyang grung 'dzom zhing spyod pa zhi ba /
rdo rje dril bu sogs bla ma'i phyag mtshan dag la thugs shin tu dgyes pas /
yab dga' spro tshad med 'phel /
yab kyis ja gral du glegs shing steng du yi ge'i gzugs brnyan 'brir bcug ste bstan pas brda bstan pa tsam la shes par gyur /
slob dpon dkon rdor gyi mdun du sbyor klog sbyong bcug ring min yi ge sbyor klog thogs med du gyur /
dgung lo bdun pa nas rtsa rgyud brtag pa gnyis pa'i tshig blor 'dzin dang yab kyis bshad pa mdzad /
dgung lo brgyad par dge 'dun tshogs pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i dbus su tshig dag la gsal ba'i sgo nas klog gsungs pas der yod kyi skye bo tshang mas bsngags par byas /
lo der mkhan po kun dga' dpal ba'i spyan sngar rab tu byung zhing dge tshul gyi sdom pa blangs /
mtshan kun dga' dpal 'byor zhes gnang /
dge tshul gyi tshig le'ur byas pa dang jo bo rje nas brgyud pa'i byang chub sems bskyed kyi cho ga sogs gsan /
'khrungs yul 'brog par song bas yul mi rnams sha chang la gtso bor spyod kyang /
sku nyid gzhon nu nas sha chang gi dri tsam yang bzhes par mi mdzad /
skabs der yab yum gyis khong la sde snod po ti 'ga' blor 'dzin byed du bcug mnga' ris pa yon tan seng ge'i mdun sa sde lnga sogs byams pa'i chos sde rnams dang bka' gdams kyi chos skor rnams gsan /
'gro mgon dbang phyug blo gros mdun sgrub thabs dang mdo mang gi lung /
'brug pa'i phyag len skor rnams gsan /
de nas mi ring bar yum 'das /
rten bzhengs pa sogs bya ba mang por thugs g.yengs par gyur /
tshe 'di'i bya ba spangs nas sgrub pa snying por bya rgyu'i dgongs pa thugs la 'khrungs /
'brug ra lung dang nye ba'i ri khrod rnams su byon nas nyams len mdzad cing phar phyin dang /
tshad ma /
mngon pa /
'dul ba bcas kyi gzhung la gzigs shing zhal 'don mdzad /
rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug 'khrul zhig gu na b+ha trA gdan drangs nas gsang sngags kyi chos mang po zhus /
bka' brgyud pa'i zab chos nA ro chos drug gi nyams len rtags thon par mdzad /
gsung mgur yang 'ga' zhig brtsams /
dgung lo bco lngar phebs pa na bu slob yon bdag rnams kyis dbus phyogs su gdan drangs /
jo bo rin po che mjal /
'bras spungs chos rje bkra shis dpal ldan sogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po dang chos 'brel gyi gtam mdzad /
kun gyis bsngags par byas /
de nas tshur 'brug tu phebs /
sku cung zad bsnyung yang ring min dwangs /
ra lung du sku mtshams bzhugs /
dgung lo bco brgyad par sna phu chos lung nas lha khang zhig bzhengs grub pa'i rab gnas la gdan drangs /
lha khang rten dang bcas par rab gnas mdzad /
dgung lo bcu dgu par yar 'brog chos rdzong du phebs /
yar 'brog pa rnams kyis 'bul ba rgya chen phul /
ston khar rong la phebs /
rin spungs nor bzang pas sne len byas nas zla shas bzhugs /
dgung lo nyi shu par dpyid kyi dus su sprel zhing du phebs /
rngog rin chen bdun brgyud kyi tha ma byang chub dpal ba dgung lo brgya zin pa mjal /
rngog lugs kyi zab chos 'ga' zhus /
rngog pa'i zhal nas da nga yun ring mi sdod pas /
nga'i dge rdzogs bsngo ba sogs khyed kyis mdzad dgos gsungs /
yun mi ring bar rngog byang chub dpal gshegs /
dge rdzogs la phebs /
rngog pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po la chos gnang bas bla slob kyi 'brel ba legs par gyur /
dgung lo nyer gnyis par lho kha phyogs kyi bu slob rnams kyis gdan drangs nas lho khar phebs /
zla ba bzhi tsam bzhugs /
rta bdun cu tham pa sogs 'bul ba rgya chen po byung /
tshur ra lung du phebs nas 'brog pa rnams la zang zing gi sku skyes legs par gnang /
dgung lo nyer gsum par khu bo sku gshegs /
gshegs brdzang legs par bsgrubs /
dgung lo nyer lnga pa'i dgung skag la yab kyi bka' ltar rdza dkar rtse dang klong rdol ri khrod sogs su bya bral mdzad nas mtshams lo gnyis tsam bzhugs /
dgung lo nyer bdun par lho brag mkhar chu sogs gnas chen rnams su byon /
yon tan bzang po'i mdun nas bka' brgyud pa'i chos mang po zhus /
rong byams chen du phebs nas paN chen nags kyi rin chen mjal bar byon /
zla ba phyed gnyis tsam bsten nas sgra dang rgyud 'ga'i dbang khrid gsan /
dus 'khor gyi dka' ba'i gnas mang po'i sgro 'dogs kyang chod /
lho brag tu zla ba phyed gnyis bzhugs te gtsug lag khang zhig gsos mdzad rjes spa gro ljongs la phebs /
'ba' ra ba nam mkha' rin chen sogs slob ma chig brgya lnga bcu tsam la nA ro chos drug sogs bka' brgyud pa'i zab chos mang po bshad nas lo gsum bzhugs /
'ba' ra ba nam mkha' rgyal mtshan la 'ba' ra ba'i chos skor tshang ma zhus /
dgung lo so gnyis par dbus su phebs te chos rje a mo g+ha shri 'brug tu gdan drangs te sgra dang snyan dngags gsan /
chos rje lhan du snye thang du phebs nas sgra'i gsan sbyong dang /
der gdan sa pa chos rje sgra pa sogs la ri chos skor gyi dam chos 'chad /
dgung lo so gsum par chos rje gtsang chen pas lha sar gdan drangs nas gser gyi 'khor los gtsos pa'i 'bul ba rgya chen phul zhing tsa ri la phebs dgos pa'i bskul ma gtong /
gra byams pa gling du bsod nams rnam rgyal mdun zab chos mang po gsan /
de nas thel dang rtse thang du phebs /
mkhan po don grub dpal ba dang las slob byang grags pa /
gsang ston slob dpon ngag dbang pa /
dge 'dun grangs tshang dbus su bsnyen rdzogs zhus shing 'bul ba rgya chen phul /
dgung lo so bdun par tsa rir phebs /
gdan sa thel du zhag bzhugs mdzad de dge 'dun brgyad brgya tsam la chos 'brel gnang /
tsa ri'i gnas chen tshang mar byon zhing tshogs 'khor bskor ba dan gsung mgur gsungs pa sogs rnam dkar dge ba'i tshogs rgya cher bsags par mdzad /
lo gcig tsam 'gor rjes ra lung du tshur byon nas sku skyes kyis yon bdag bu slob thams cad tshim par mdzad /
rin spungs dang mon yul sogs su chos 'khor bskor /
'brug gi gtsug lag khang zhig gsos mdzad /
dgung lo zhe gsum par dwags lha sgam po'i gdan sar bzhugs dgos pa'i bskul ma byas /
zla ba bcu pa'i tshes bco lnga nyin dwags po zla 'od gzhon nu'i gdan khrir bzhugs /
dge 'dun 'dus pa nyis stong tsam la chos kyi sbyin pa rgya chen po dang mang ja 'gyed bcas phun sum tshogs pa gnang /
de rjes gdan sa thel sogs bka' brgyud pa'i gdan sa mang por chos kyi 'khor lo bskor /
mgur mang po gsungs /
tsa ri dang dwags kong stod smad kyi bsgrub gnas rnams su sgrub khang nyi shu rtsa grangs brtsigs /
sgrub pa nyams len la zhugs pa'i slob ma nyams rtogs can mang po byung /
tsa ri'i gnas chen rnams su yang yang phebs /
karma pa'i dgon gnas nag phu'i dgon par phebs /
bu chu'i gnas sgo phye /
der yun ring tsam bzhugs nas gsung 'bum tha thor rnams legs sgrig byas te zhu dag mdzad /
de nas dwags po dang ra lung bcas su tshur phebs nas rten bzhengs chos 'chad sogs dkar po dge ba'i phyag las kho nas dus 'da' bar mdzad /
dgung lo zhe brgyad par /
chos rje byams pa gling pa sku gshegs pa'i gtam gsan /
spyan chab mang po gsil zhing thugs skyo ngal shin tu che bar mdzad /
de nas bzung thugs sna yang je thung lta bur gyur /
byams pa gling pa'i gzim khang gzigs pa tsam la phyag 'tshal zhing /
spyan chab gsil bzhin par smon lam mang po btab /
mi ring bar dwags la sgam por phebs /
dwags po'i dbon po gdan par bkod /
de min dgon pa'i las sne rnams kyang bskos /
sgam po'i yon mchod rnams la spyi dgos kyi bka' lung gnang /
de nas tsa rir thengs tha ma phebs /
byams pa gling pa'i dgongs rdzogs la dmigs pa'i mchod pa rgya chen phul /
tshur byon nas byams gling /
dwags la sgam por lung bcas su phebs nas chos 'chad mdzad /
mthar gtsang gi bu slob rnams kyi re ba ltar spos skya gzims khang du bzhugs /
de nas mi ring bar dgung lo zhe dgu la phebs pa rab byung brgyad pa'i me pho sprel lo zla ba bcu pa'i tshes bco lnga la 'brum nad bzhes te zla ba bcu gcig pa'i gnam gang nyin pa'i mtshan mor dgongs pa rdzogs /
khong gi gsung chos tshan ka pa nas za pa'i bar nyer gsum yod pa'i pod chen zhig nged dpe mdzod khang du bzhugs yod /

'brug pa kun dga' legs pa'i gsung 'bum / /
par ma /
rnal 'byor pa'i ming can kun dga' legs pa'i rnam thar byung tshul lhug par smras pa zhib mo'i rtsing mo ha le ho le sna zin spu zin nas bkod pa ces bya ba bzhugs so / /
rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po kun dga' legs pa'i rnam thar gsung 'bum rgya mtsho las dad pa'i ku shas chu thigs tsam blangs pa ngo mtshar bdud rtsi'i zil mngar ces bya ba bzhugs so / /
rnal 'byor pa'i ming can kun dga' legs pa'i nyams la shar ba'i phral gyi chos spyod 'dra dang nyams 'char ci byung ma byung bris pa skyag gtad gang yang med pa dga' zhig bzhugs so / /
rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug kun dga' legs pa'i gsung 'bum thor bu bzhugs so / /
rtsom pa po'i lo rgyus nyung bsdus /

khong dgung lo bcu gsum la son skabs snel pa ba'i phyogs kyis yab bkrongs stabs /

gzhis ka rin spungs pa'i mi dbang kun tu bzang po'i phyag phyir slebs /
der lo drug tsam bzhugs /
de nas dbus su phebs skabs rin spungs kun tu bzang pos khong la gnang ba'i spos shel gyi phreng ba dang rna g.yu legs po zhig yod pa de sring mo rgan par gnang /

de'i skabs r+wa lung rin po ches 'tsho rkyen gnang nas spos skyar sdod ces gsungs /
der rgyud brtag gnyis gsan sbyang mdzad de zla ba brgyad tsam bzhugs /

gnas rnying dgon du phebs /

gram pa dka' bcu pa /

'brug pa padma dkar po'i gsung 'bum / /
par ma /
ka sems dpa' chen po padma dkar po'i rnam thar thugs rje chen po'i zlos gar zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /

bla ma bzang po bkra shis rtsa ba'i bla mar bsten nas lo nyer bdun ring 'bral ba med par rjes su 'brangs /
sbyor klog thugs 'dzin nas mdo sngags rig gnas dang bcas bla ma'i thugs la bzhugs dgu bum pa gang byo'i tshul du sbyangs /
bla mas kyang dgyes pa chen pos bskyangs /
khong dgung lo zhe gnyis pa shing byi lor bla ma bzang po bkra shis dag zhing du gshegs /
dgongs rdzogs legs par bsgrubs shing bla ma'i shul 'dzin mdzad nas 'chad nyan sgom sgrub la thugs brtson lhod med mdzad /
de nas skyid gshongs pa blo gros rnam rgyal dang kun dga' grol mchog gnyis kyis gtsos ris med kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po bsten nas rig pa'i gnas ma lus par sbyangs pa mthar phyin mdzad /
lhag par du tshad ma dang rtsis kyi rig pa la mkhas pa'i yang rtser son /
skyid gshongs pa blo gros rnam rgyal mdun nas tshad ma rig pa'i gzhung lugs mthil phyin sbyangs /
sa paN gyi rig gter la 'grel pa <<legs bshad nyi ma'i 'od zer>> brtsams nas dka' ba'i gnad rnams re re bzhin dgag bzhag spong gsum gyis gtan la phab /
'dul ba dang mngon pa mdzod sogs la'ang don snying 'dus la tshig nyung ba'i sgo nas 'grel bshad legs par brtsams /
rtsis kyi bstan bcos kyang <<bstan rtsis nyi ma'i 'od zer>> sogs tshad ldan gyi bstan bcos 'ga' brtsams /
mdor na phyi nang gi rig gnas kun la mkhas par gyur te dpal ldan sa skya'i bstan pa rgyas par mdzad cing slob ma mkhas pa yang mang po byung /
khong gi gsung chos tshan pa bdun yod pa'i gsung 'bum bris ma pod gcig nged dpe mdzad khang du bzhugs yod /

yab rma se rgya gar dang /
yum gling bza' bsod nams sgrol ma gnyis kyi sras su rab byung drug pa'i me stag lor mdo khams karma dgon dang nye bar gyam sher du sku bltams /

sems bskyed kyi sdom pa gnang /

theg mchog sngags kyi pho brang chen por bya spyod rnal 'byor gsum las spyod rgyud rigs gsum gyi skabs kyi bkod yig bzhugs so / /
theg mchog pho brang gi lho brar sgrol ma brgya rtsa'i lha tshogs kyi bkod yig mthu stobs rtse sogs kyi bkod yig bzhugs so / /
theg mchog pho brang gi bar sgo shar nub kyi nang logs la rta mgrin lugs gnyis dang sme brtsegs gzhan gzungs phran mang zhig bzhugs pa'i bkod yig mthu stobs gling du chos skyong rnams kyi bkod yig srid 'khor dang thar 'khor gyi rten bshad bzhugs so / /
srid 'khor dang thar 'khor gyi bkod yig bzhugs so / /
rtsom pa po'i lo rgyus nyung bsdus /
gtsug lag phreng ba ni lha sa snye thang gi sgang rgyud du /
gdung rus gnyags kyi rigs yab bla ma dar dang /
yum lam rnyed sgrol ma'i sras su rab byung brgyad pa'i shing byi lor sku 'khrungs /
dgung lo lnga phebs par chu 'brug lor dge bsnyen cha lung pas dpa' bo chos dbang lhun grub kyi sku phreng gnyis par ngos 'dzin zhus te bka' brgyud yongs kyi chu 'go lho bro bo lung gi gdan sar bkod /
de nas bla ma rtogs ldan dge 'dun rgya mtsho la bod yig 'bri klog sogs 'phral mkho kun la mkhas par sbyangs /
dgung lo dgu par karma pa zhwa dmar bzhi pa dpal chos grags ye shes pa'i drung nas dge bsnyen dang dge tshul bsgrubs /
mtshan la mi pham chos kyi rgyal po zhes gsol /
bla ma de dang dwags po paN+Di ta chos rgyal bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan /
dbus smyon he ru ka rnams la gsang sngags gsar rnying gi chos skor rgya cher gsan /
khyad par snyigs dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa karma phrin las pa chen po dgung lo dgu nas nyer brgyad bar du bsten nas mdo rgyud man ngag gi chos rgyun du ma bum pa gang byo'i tshul du gsan /
de nas chos grwa chen po legs bshad gling du phebs /
bka' chen bzhi la sogs pa mkhas mang gi dbus su bgro gleng gis gtan la 'bebs /
nyin ltar gzhung chen rnams thugs 'dzin mdzad /
dgung lo nyer gsum par zhwa lu chos skyong bzang pos mkhan po dang /
mkhan chen chos grub seng ges las slob nam mkha' dpal ldan gyis gsang ston byas te dad pa'i dge slong bdun tshogs las bsnyen par rdzogs /
dgung lo nyer dgu par kong por phebs skabs zing po 'bum pa sgang du karma mi bskyod rdo rje mjal /
dgon gnas 'khor longs spyod thams cad phul nas bcu phrag rig pa'i gnas la gsan sbyangs mdzad /
lhod pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha brtan pa dang /
phul du byung ba'i rnam dpyod zung du 'jug pa'i mthus rab 'byams shes bya kun la bsregs bcad brdar ba'i gser bzhin mi 'phrog pa'i mkhyen rab rgyas /
de'i phyir karma pas mtshan la dpal gtsug lag phreng ba zhes btags /
dgung lo so bdun pa nas bzung tsa ri'i gnas nang dang /
mkha' ro'i gsang phug mtsho dkar khyung rdzong gi gnas rnams su lo gsum dang zla ba phyed dgu'i bar sgrub pa la bzhugs /
gang thos pa'i don rnams nyams bzhes su gnang bas tshig 'khri'i rtsod pa dang go ba 'ol spyi tsam ma yin par /
rang rgyud kyi nyon mongs 'dul ba'i gnyen po dang rgya chen 'gro ba yongs la phan bde'i rtsa ba ru rtogs /
lho gro bo lung gi mkhar las zhig gsos dang /
sras mkhar la rgya phibs gtsang khang du sangs rgyas rab bdun kun dga' bo phyag rdor khro bo /
mar pa'i sku sogs bka' brgyud gser phreng rnams legs par bzhengs /
karma sgrub tshogs sde bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi sde btsugs /
karma mi bskyod rdo rje lho kha yar lung stod ra mor dgongs pa chos dbyings su thim pa la sku gdung zhugs 'bul dang /
khong gi rgyal tshab tu zhwa dmar lnga pa gser khrir mnga' gsol sogs mdzad /
rab byung dgu pa'i shing sbrul lo nas chos 'byung mkhas pa'i dga' ston brtsams 'go tshugs te mthar shing byi lo'i bar lo ngo nyi shu rtsa gcig ring legs par zhib 'jug gnang ste brtsams grub par mdzad /
zhwa dmar lnga pa dang rgyal tshab grags pa don grub gnyis mdo khams su karma pa sku phreng dgu pa gdan 'dren du phebs ring la /
zhwa dmar nag gi rgyal tshab mdzad /
dbus gtsang dwags kong sogs bod yul phal cher zhabs kyis bcags /
gang la gang 'tshams kyis dbang lung rgya cher bstsal /
mi ring bar karma pa dgu pa dbang phyug rdo rje mtshur phur gser khrir mnga' gsol mdzad /
nyin re bzhin thugs kyi bum par bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba bka' brgyud pa'i zab chos rgya mtsho lta bu rnams rgyal ba zhwa dmar nag dang dbus gtsang khams gsum sogs nas rig gnas don du gnyer ba byung ngo cog la dpe 'khyud med par tshig don go sla la 'brel chags pa'i bgo skal 'gyed /
de'i mthu las gdul bya slob ma rnams kyang rig gnas gang cir mkhyen spyan yangs pa sha stag byung /
longs spyod kyi dngos po byung ngo cog lto srog 'tsho tsam dang na bza' rgyab dros tsam las /
de min tshang ma dge 'dun gyi sde dang rten bzhengs kho na'i ched du 'bul /
tshe 'di pa'i ched du thob thang dang snyan grags don du mi gnyer /
chos lugs dang lo rgyus sogs brtsams chos kun yin lugs bzhin bris pa las /
'khyog bshad dang rang mthong gi che gtam sogs med par gzu bo'i blo ldan dgyes pa'i legs bshad kho na brtsams /
mthar dgung lo re gsum pa rab byung dgu pa'i me stag lo'i zla ba bcu pa'i tshes bcu drug gi tho rangs su re zhig gzugs sku'i bkod pa bsdus so / /
slob ma'i gtso bo karma pa dgu pa dbang phyug rdo rje dang zhwa dmar lnga pa dkon mchog yan lag rgyal tshab sprul sku sogs mkhas shing btsun pa'i slob bu mang du spel /
bstan bcos kyang phag mo'i rnam bshad chen mo chos 'byung chen mo mkhas pa'i dga' ston /
rtsis kun bsdus pa'i 'grel pa rin chen gter mdzod sogs pod mang du mchis pa las nged dpe mdzod khang du chos 'byung mkhas pa'i dga' ston sogs pod gsum bzhugs so / /

par ma /
nga shAkya'i btsun pa blo bzang 'phrin las kyi zab pa dang rgya che ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi thob yig gsal ba'i me long las glegs bam bzhi pa bzhugs so / /
rtsom pa po'i lo rgyus nyung bsdus /
dza ya paN+Di ta ni sog po'i yul khal kha hang ka'i hang gi mnga' 'og hu chir thu zhes pa'i sa gnas su yab gzungs thar dang yum dkon mchog la dad pa lhag par che ba de gnyis kyi sras su rab byung bcu gcig pa'i chu pho rta lo zla ba bzhi pa'i tshes bco lnga'i snga mor 'khrungs /
dgung lo bzhi pa'i dus su rab 'byams pa blo gros rgya mtsho la dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa blangs /
dgung lo lnga pa nas yi ge 'bri klog sbyong ba'i 'go brtsams te dbu mdzad shes rin pa'i drung nas 'jigs byed kyi cho ga sogs blor 'dzin gyi dbu btsugs /
dgung lo bcu gnyis par sog sprul blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan mjal tshe dbang sogs zab chos 'ga' zhus rjes khong la no yon hu thug thu zhes pa'i mtshan bstsal /
lugs gnyis kyi sgo nas spyan bskyang chen po mdzad /
dgung lo bcu drug pa me mo bya lor dge 'dun bsod nams dang lhan cig tu rje btsun dam pa mjal bar byon /
tshe dbang dang bla ma'i rnal 'byor sogs zhus /
byin rten mang po gnang /
blo bzang 'phrin las rgya mtsho sogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang por brten nas rig gnas spyi dang khyad par lo tsA slob pa'i dbu btsugs te rnam 'joms bya ba khrus cho ga sog skad du bsgyur /
rje btsun dam pa'i gsol 'debs shig gsung rtsom gyi thog ma'i rtsom phud du mdzad /
dgung lo bcu dgu pa lcags byi lo'i ston khar rang yul nas thon te dbus phebs kyi 'go brtsams /
mtsho sngon sku 'bum dgon du phebs /
sku 'bum smon lam chen mo'i tshogs su gdan drangs te g.yas gral gyi mgor bzhugs /
sku 'bum tshogs par mang ja dang 'gyed legs par phul /
skabs de'i sku 'bum gyi khri pas mthong ha cang chen po mdzad /
de nas co ne dgon sogs brgyud dbus lha ldan du byon /
zla ba dgu par lha sar 'byor /
gtsug lag dang /
jo shaka rnam gnyis /
se 'bras bcas mjal zhing /
lnga pa chen po'i spyan sngar rab byung dge tshul gyi sdom pa mnos /
lha sar zla ba gnyis tsam 'gor rjes stod lung sogs byang lam nas gtsang bkras lhun la phebs /
zla ba bcu gcig pa'i tshes brgyad nyin /

de nas yul gcig pa'i slob grogs 'gas bskul ba la brten bkra shis lhun por gsan sbyong mdzad rgyu'i thugs thag bcad /
dka' chen bsod nams grags pa dge rgan bsten nas gzhung pod lnga la sbyangs pa nan smin mdzad /
dgung lo nyer gsum pa shing 'brug lor dpyid zla gsum par pho brang po ta lar gzim chung nyi 'od 'khyil ba'i nang rgyal dbang lnga pas mkhan slob sbrags ma dang rje byams pa rin chen gyis gsang ston mdzad /
dge ba'i bshes gnyen grangs tshang tshogs pa'i dbus su dge slong gi sdom pa yang dag par blangs /
lnga pa chen pos byams chos lnga'i lung sogs dam chos 'ga' yang gnang /
de nas dgung lo so bdun par lnga pa chen po'i spyan sngar dge bsnyen nas bzung dge tshul slong gi sdom pa bskyar bsgrubs mdzad /
slar bkra shis lhun por byon nas mdo sngags kyi gzhung lugs rab 'byams la gsan sbyong yun ring mdzad par ma zad sman dang rtsis sogs thun mong rig gnas dag la'ang sbyangs pa mthil phyin mdzad /
de nas dbus lha ldan du byon te pha bong khar bzhugs nas rdo rje 'dzin pa 'jam dbyangs grags pa'i drung du gsang sngags kyi zab chos ma lus pa gsan /
de nas gtsang du phebs shing slad mar gtsang dang dbus bar lan mang phebs bzhud mdzad cing khrid lung zhu ba dang rten mjal sogs thengs mang mdzad /
mdor na dbus gtsang du rgyal ba paN chen gnyis kyi gtsos mkhas dbang dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang por brten nas mdo sngags rig gnas bcas la sbyangs pa mthar phyin nas dgung lo so brgyad pa sa mo lug gi lor byang phyogs hor gyi yul du chibs kha bsgyur /
zla ba lnga pa'i tshes pa bcu gcig nyin lha sa nas bteg byang lam brgyud nag chur zhag bcu tsam mal gso mdzad de 'bri chu brgal te zla ba brgyad pa'i tshes gcig la mtsho sngon por 'byor /
sku 'bum bcas la mjal kha phebs zin rjes sog po'i dpon bla bsu mi mang po 'byor ba dang lhan cig tu rim gyis bteg ste zla ba bcu pa'i tshes gsum nyin par rang yul du 'byor nas drin can gyi yab yum gnyis kyi zhal mjal zhing thugs snang skyid pa'i bgro gleng byas te nyin gsum tsam bzhugs /
de nas phyogs de'i dgon khag rnams su phebs shing bla ma dang dpon khag rnams kyis 'bul chen stobs shing dga' bsu rgya chen byas /
bcu gnyis pa'i tshes gsum nyin par rang dgon du 'byor /
rje btsun dam pa sogs bla chen rnams mjal zhing 'bul skyes rgya chen phul /
grwa mang la mang 'gyed dang yon bdag rnams la skyes phun sum tshogs pa bstsal /

rje btsun dam pa ri bo dge rgyas gling gi dgon par phebs skabs khong phyag phyir phebs /
rje btsun dam pas gser srang bcu dang rta sum cus gtsos pa'i gnang sbyin spom mtho ba bstsal /
me mo stag gi lor dga' ldan khri thog zhe bzhi pa ngag dbang blo gros rgya mtsho sog yul du ha la ha o'i dus zing gi bar 'dum la phebs pa khu ring pil chir du zhal mjal zhing chos 'ga' gsan /
chos rje a chi thus khong mkhar sngon por gdan drangs der gdul bya mang po smin grol gyi lam la bkod /
lcags lug lor gong mar 'tshams zhu mdzad pa'i ched du gong ma'i pho brang du phebs /
gong mas dza sag gi go gnas gnang /
lo de'i phyi lor yang gong mar 'tshams zhur phebs nas rje btsun dam pa dang mnyam du gong ma'i yum the hu'i rten rnams la rab gnas mdzad /

de nas tshur phebs te mkhar sngon du dgon pa'i khrir bzhugs te 'chad nyan yun ring mdzad /

de na dgon pa gsar bzhengs dang rgya bskyed /
slob ma mang por chos 'chad nyan /
dgon pa'i rten bka' 'gyur bzhengs pa sogs mdzad /

de nas slob ma'i gtso bo mkhar sngon rab 'byams pa dang bka' 'gyur ba mer gen bka' bcu pa sogs la 'chad nyan yun ring mdzad pa dang /
dge tshul dge slong gi sdom pa mang po gnang ba /
o rong rab brtan wang dang bkra shis wang sogs wang mang por zab chos gnang ba dge 'dun shin tu mang por bka' 'gyur gyi lung sogs dbang lung mang po gnang /

par ma /

pha rgod rdo rje 'chang chen mi pham dbyangs can dgyes pa'i rdo rje dpal bzang po'i sku'i ring bsrel snying por bzhugs pa'i mchod sdong dkar chag gdung sel sman gyi dri bsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rigs dang dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag pha gcig rin 'byung sgeg pa'i rdo rje dpal bzang po'i gsang rnam gsol 'debs rin chen dang po'i sbram bu zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /

bka' drin 'khor med pha rgod rdo rje 'chang a b+h+ya zhabs kyi 'khrungs rabs gsol 'debs dad pa'i 'khri shing zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /

par ma /
ga 'phags pa rigs gsum mgon po'i sprul pa'i bkod pa las brtsams pa'i gtam chos rdzong rang dkar po'i rna rgyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
skyabs mgon skal ldan rgya mtsho'i nye ba'i sras chen dpal chos mkhan chen zhal snga nas blo bzang lung rtogs chos kyi rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i rnam par thar pa spyod pa mchog gi rgyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rong chen bstan pa'i sgron me chen po skal bzang blo gros kun dga' lung rtogs rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i rnam par thar pa gser gyi gar bu zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
'jam mgon rgyal ba'i dbang po'i nye sras rong chen bstan pa'i nyi ma chen po ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa tshe ring dpal bzang po'i gsang ba'i rnam thar mdo tsam brjod pa gsang ba mchog gi gter zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
skye rgu'i dpung gnyen stag tsha sku phreng rim byon gyi rnam par thar pa mdo tsam brjod pa rig byed ngag gi gling bu zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bdag nyid chen po rdzong dkar spyan snga pa dkon mchog phun tshogs dpal bzang po'i rtogs pa brjod pa legs tshogs sgo brgya phye ba'i bden gtam zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rtogs pa brjod pa'i rgyud las brtsams te skal pa bzang po dang ldan pa rnams la gtam du bya ba spel ma'i bstan bcos zla gzhon 'dzum pa'i phon po zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
ngo mtshar rmad byung bkod pa'i zhing gi bshad pa smon lam dang bcas pa rmad byung bkod par 'jug pa'i them skas zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
par ma /
nga bla na med pa'i yon tan gyi dbang phyug tu grub pa yab gcig 'jam dbyangs thub bstan rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i rnam par thar pa thun mong du bsgrag par rjes su gnang ba legs mdzad gtam gyi snying po skal pa bzang po'i rna cha zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bla na med pa'i yon tan gyi dbang phyug tu grub pa yab gcig 'jam dbyangs thub bstan rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i rnam par thar pa thun mong ma yin pa gsar pa'i gtam gyi snying po skal ba bzang po'i rna cha zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
'jam dbyangs bla ma yongs 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po blo bzang dpal ldan gyi zhal snga nas kyi thun mong pa'i rnam par thar pa cha tsam brjod pa rdzogs ldan de nyid snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
par ma /
ca dpal ldan bla ma mchog nas zab rgyas gdams pa'i chos rgyun gsan bzhes mdzad tshul nyung ngu'i tshig tu 'god pa dad pa'i rdzing bu 'phel ba zla zer zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bka' 'gyur gyi thob yig bsdus pa bzhugs so / /
bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi skor phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa bzhugs so / /
bstan 'dzin dam pa rnams la bstod pa'i rim pa phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa bzhugs so / /
lhag pa'i lha rnams la bstod pa'i rim pa phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa bzhugs so / /
gnas khyad par can rnams la bstod pa'i rim pa phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa bzhugs so / /
sdom gsum bslab bya'i sdom tshig mdor bsdus su bkod pa bzhugs so / /
par ma /
cha bka' drin mtshungs med bla ma rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gsung 'bum cha pa'i dkar chag bzhugs so / /
sngags rim snying po rig 'dzin bye ba'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rim lnga gsal sgron gyi dka' gnas brjed byang du bkod pa zab don snang ba'i nyi ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rim lnga gsal sgron gyi sa bcad rdo rje'i tshig don rnam par 'byed pa'i rig sngags zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud 'grel pa dang bcas pa'i don ji ltar bshad pa'i tshul yi ger bkod pa 'chad nyan rgyal mtshan sgreng pa'i yu ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
'dus pa'i 'grel pa 'chad pa la nye bar mkho ba'i shog byang bzhugs so / /

ja dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed khros pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /

par ma /
nya bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal khros pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtsa ba'i rgyud rtog pa bdun pa'i rgya cher bshad pa rdo rje'i tshig gi sgo 'byed ces bya ba'i smad cha bzhugs so / /

rtsom pa po'i lo rgyus nyung bsdus /
zhwa dmar dge 'dun bstan 'dzin rgya mtsho ni mtsho sngon zhing chen gyi sa'i bye brag mda' bzhi ru sde'am dkar thang mar khu'i mtsho mo zhes pa'i yul du /

dgung lo brgyad pa'i dus su mkhan chen dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i mdun nas rab tu byung /
gsang sngags skor gyi dbang 'ga' zhig zhus /
dgung lo bcu gcig par la mo bde chen chos gling dgon du chos grwar zhugs /
dgung lo bcu bzhi nas bzung a khu shes rab rgya mtsho dang tshul khrims dpal ldan sogs kyi spyan sngar rig pa'i gnas rnams la sbyong ba'i sgo thog mar phye /
lo bco lnga'i ston dus su a rol blo bzang lung rigs rgya mtsho mjal zhing dam chos mang po zhus nas lo gsum bzhi tsam la slob dpon du bsten /
dgung grangs bcu dgu par bla brang bkra shis 'khyil du byon nas a khu shes rab rgya mtshos gtsos ngag dbang thub bstan rgya mtsho thu'u bkwan yongs 'dzin bstan pa rgya mtsho sogs kyi mdun nas mdo sngags kyi zab chos mtha' yas pa gsan /
de dus nas bzung rtsa ba'i bla ma lung rigs rgya mtsho'i zhal bkod ltar ri khrod pa'i tshul bzung nas 'jig rten phal pa'i bya bzhag ring du dor /
rig gnas mkhas pa tshangs sras dgyes pa'i blo ldan dang /
'jam dbyangs tshul khrims rgya mtsho bcas las sgra dang snyan ngag sdebs sbyor bcas thun mong rig pa'i gnas kun legs par sbyangs /
ri khrod pa dkyus ma'i tshul gyis bzhugs shing skabs der lto gos 'grig tsam las med mod /
phyis su 'bul nor rgya chen byung bar brten /
ri khrod pa rnams la 'gyed dang mang ja sogs rgya chen phul bar ma zad /
sgo dmar dgon gyi 'du khang du thub pa'i sku brnyan mtho tshad ma chig stong la gser phul nas sbyor 'jags mdzad pa sogs rnam dkar gyi phyag las rgya chen mdzad /
dgung lo so lngar phebs pa na rtsa ba'i bla ma smon lam bzang po zhing gzhan du gshegs pa'i dgongs rdzogs legs par bsgrubs /
bla mas sngar nas zhal bkod gnang ba dang du blangs te dgung lo so drug nas bya khyung dgon pa dang nye ba'i ri khrod rnams su bzhugs te dge sbyor la 'bad /
der ri khrod pa rnams dang mnyam du bya khyung gser gdung chen mo'i mdun du mchod me khri lnga lhag 'bul ba sogs rnam dkar gyi dge tshogs bsgrubs /
de nas bzung rma chu'i nyi srib dang sgo me stod smad kyi ri khrod pa rnams lhan cig tshogs nas mchod 'bul rgya chen byed pa'i srol btsugs /
ri khrod pa kun gyis bla mar bkur zhing de dag la zab chos mang po bstsal /
ri khrod pa sum brgya lhag tu 'phel bar ma zad nye 'khor gyi grwa mang tshang ma'ang slob mar 'dus /
de dag la gzhung pod lnga'i 'chad nyan mdzad cing /
dus tshigs so so'i dus mchod kyi rten rtsa bzhag bya khyung dgon par tshogs chen du mang 'gyed dang mchod thebs kyi rtsa ba rgya phibs la gser tshos kyi zhal 'debs sogs dngos dngul rgya chen phul /
rang dgon bde chen chos gling du mchod rdzas dang mchod cha rten rtsa sogs dngul srang bdun stong lhag gi yon phul /
chu sbrul lor sku 'bum du phyag bteg grwa mang la snga phyir 'gyed thengs brgyad tsam btang /
me bya lor rnga ba'i sangs rgyas stong skur gser tshos phul ba dang mi nyag mchod rten dkar po sogs la nyams gso mdzad /
mdo smad kyi dgon khag kun tu phebs te /
mang 'gyed btang ba sogs dge ba'i las rgya chen bsgrubs /
bla ma'i drin gzo ba'i phyir me phag lo nas lo nyer lnga'i ring mchod me khri phrag lnga re lo ltar chag med du phul /
me rta lor lde tsha dgon bkra shis chos gling gsar 'debs kyi dbu btsugs /
lo bzhir yongs su grub /
'du khang dang gser khang li ma'i lha khang sogs gtsug lag khang rgya phibs bcas dang thub pa gtso 'khor che legs dang thub sku khru tshad ma stong phrag sgrol ma'i sku brnyan sogs gser zangs las bsgrubs pa dang /
chos cha mchod rdzas bcas phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs /
dgon der phyis su tshogs pa lnga brgya tsam 'dus /

zhwa lu blo gsal bstan skyong ni /
gtsang nyang stod rig pa'i 'byung gnas kyi sa cha skyid sbug ces pa'i yul du yab tshangs pa dkar po dgung lo nyer gcig pa dang yum dge skyed bu khrid dgung na so brgyad pa gnyis las rab byung bcu gsum pa'i shing pho byi ba'i zla ba dang po'i tshes nyi shu'i nyin tho rangs la sku bltams /

yi ge'i phyi mo ka kha sogs sbyong ba'i 'go btsugs /

rin chen lhun grub kyis byang gling bla brang du gdan drangs gsol ja drangs /

dbyar khar bkra shis lhun por byon nas paN chen la chos mang po gsan /
dgung lo bcu gcig pa shing khyi lor mong gol bla ma mkhan chen no mi han ri phug tu 'byor nas bla ma ye shes dpal 'byor dang byams pa rin chen lhun grub gnyis la dbang chos mang po zhu ba dang mnyam du lung mang po zhus /
dgung lo bcu gnyis par sman khang pa'i phyag phyir 'brangs /

khong yang bla ma mnyam du rtse thang du byon /
de nas khong gi khyim nas gdan 'dren pa byung nas tshur rang yul du log dgung lo bcu gsum pa nas gso rig sbyong 'dod pa'i dgongs pa 'khrungs /

rgyud bzhi'i rtsa ba blor 'dzin dang bod 'grel mang po la gsan bsam mdzad /

gdung la swats+tsha 'debs pa dang mchod rten bzhengs pa bcas mdzad /
bla ma sku gshegs par thugs skyo nas lo gsum sku mtshams dam por bcad /
dgung lo nyer gcig par bkra shis lhun por paN chen blo bzang dpal ldan bstan pa'i nyi ma'i mdun dge slong gi sdom pa blangs /
de nas sa skya dang ngor dgon gyi rten brten pa rnams mjal /
snar thang khro phu sogs kyang mjal bar byon /
bla ma dam pa ye shes dpal 'byor la sa ngor tshar gsum gyi chos mang du zhus /
de nas bzung bu ston gsung 'bum gyi lung dang gzhan yang dbang rjes gnang sogs bla ma ye shes dpal 'byor gyi thugs la zab chos bzhugs dgu bum pa gang byo'i tshul gyis zhus /
de nas mi ring bar zhabs phyi don grub dang dge slong bkra shis dpal 'byor gnyis kyis khres po khyer /

tshe spel rdo rje /
