bzo dang gso ba rtsis kyi rig gnas sogs la'ang sbyangs pa rgya cher mdzad /
khyad par rtsa ba'i bla ma dam tshig rdo rje'i spyan sngar dge bsnyen nas rab byung dge tshul dang dge slong gi sdom pa rnams rim par mnos /
bla ma dam tshig rdo rje dang /
gzhung las pa yar 'phel tshang gis yun ring bslab ston mdzad pa la brten nas chos dang 'jig rten gyi bya bzhag kun la nang byan chud par gyur te gzhung las pa'i las gnas 'dzin /
de nas bzung mdo dang sngags kyi gzhung mang por rang stobs kyis dpyad pa la gzhan dring mi 'jog pa'i mkhyen stobs rgyas shing gzhung 'grel dang dgag lan gyi gsung rab mang po brtsams /
lam rim che 'bring chung gsum dang sngags rim chen mo sogs rje'i gsung thun mong ma yin pa rnams dang /
bstan 'gyur khrod kyi gzhung mang po'i bshad pa mdzad cing /
me rge chos rje tshe spel dbang phyug rdo rje sogs slob ma mang po spel /
khong gi gsung ni rang gi gsung tshe spel dbang phyug rdo rje'i rnam thar du 'khod par bltas na /
pod ka pa nas ja pa'i bar pod bdun tsam khong ma 'das gong nas me rge chos rjes mthun rkyen sbyar nas par du bskrun zin 'dug cing de min gsung rtsom gzhan yod med ma nges la nged dpe mdzod khang du ka pod nas kha pod bar po ti gnyis las bzhugs med cing pod gnyis po sog po'i par ma yin no / /

'ol kha bsod nams ye shes dbang po'i gsung 'bum / /
bris ma /
rje btsun bsod nams ye shes dbang po'i gsung 'bum dkar chag bzhugs so / /
bsod nams ye shes dbang po'i rnam thar mthong ba don ldan bzhugs so / /
bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs /
rgya nag lha bzos bsgrub pa'i zhal thang gi yi ge bkod pa / /
bde mchog dril bu lha lnga'i lag mchod mdun bskyed mchod phreng smon lam shis brjod bcas bzhugs so / /
bde mchog dril bu'i lha lnga'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga bzhugs so / /
bstan pa spyi dgos la dag snang dang yid ches kyi dad pa bskyed tshul mdor bsdus pa bzhugs so / /
lam yig yid bzhin nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
li thang du thub bstan byams chen chos 'khor phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba btab ste thub chen khams gsum zil gnon bzhengs ba'i nang bzhugs phul ba'i dkar chags su bkod khra bzhugs so / /
myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po phyag drug pa'i bsnyen bsgrub las gsum gyi rnam bzhag dngos grub 'byung gnas bzhugs so / /
mdo sngags kyi lam gyi sgo 'byed lta ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
kha 'bar ma'i gtor chog gzhan phan bdud sde 'joms pa bzhugs so / /
gcod kyi dmigs rim mdor bsdus bzhugs so / /
dpal dur khrod bdag po'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so / /
rtsom pa po'i lo rgyus nyung bsdus /
'ol kha bsod nams ye shes dbang po ni bod dbus gtsang khams gsum las dbus kyi yul gru'i bye brag stod lung gi sa char rab byung dgu pa'i me pho 'brug gi lo la sku bltams /
khong gi yum ni chos la dad pa che zhing rgyun du yig drug gi zhal 'don mdzad mkhan dang /
chos srung dpal ldan lha mo'i thugs kyi sprul pa las mkhan 'bum me zhes pa snying du brlabs nas lung bstan sna tshogs gsung mkhan zhig kyang yin /
khong dgung na bzhi pa'i bar ma de'i rtsar skye bsrings byas /
bar der yum dang byis pa'i skad cha 'ga' la brten mi rnams kyis byis pa de sprul sku zhig yin pa'i gtam kun tu brjod /
gtam de 'bras spungs su tshor bas /
bla ma gong ma bsod nams grags pa'i gsol dpon chos grags der byis pa de sprul sku yin min brtag par yong /
sprul sku yin par yid ches nas tA la'i sprul sku bsod nams rgya mtshor snyan seng phul /
tA la'i bsod nams rgya mtshos slob dpon lha btsun pa mngags nas brtag bcug rjes /
paN chen bsod nams grags pa'i yang srid yin par thag bcad /
dgung lo bzhi pa'i dus su lha btsun pa gtsos bsu mi rta pa sum cu tsam stod lung du yong nas 'bras spungs dgon du gdan drangs /
chos grwa chen po skyor mo lung du zhag mal mdzad /
der dge 'dun pa rnams kyis ser sbreng zab rgyas kyis bsus shing bsnyen bskur legs par byas /
de nas khri zam khar phebs 'byor skabs su 'bras spungs kyi dpon slob dge 'dun mang pos bsu bar 'byor /
dgon par 'byor la nye ba na gdugs rgyal mtshan dang rol cha sna tshogs thogs pa'i ser sbreng gis bsdus /
dga' ldan pho brang du phebs skabs tA la'i bsod nams rgya mtshos gdan las bzhengs te gus pa'i tshul gyis bsu bar mdzad /
de'i rgyu mtshan ni paN chen bsod grags tA la'i bsod nams rgya mtsho'i bla ma yin la byis pa 'di bla ma'i sprul sku yin stabs de bzhin mdzad pa red /
de nas mi ring bar tA la'i bsod nams rgya mtsho'i spyan sngar skra phud phul te rab tu byung /
mtshan bsod nams ye shes dbang por btags /
de nas bzung ka kha sogs sbyor sdeb legs par sbyangs rjes klog gi thog ma mdo sde gser 'od dam pa nas dbu btsugs /
sngags kyi klog thabs sogs gsan cing yun mi ring bar klog thogs med du mkhyen /
rtsa ba'i yongs 'dzin bsod nams rgya mtsho la tshe dpag med grub rgyal ma dang mgon po phyag drug pa'i rjes gnang sogs zhus /
'jigs byed dang phyag drug pa'i mngon rtogs sogs blor 'dzin dgos pa'i rigs rnams sbyangs /
mngon rtogs rgyan dang rtsa ba shes rab tshad ma rnam 'grel sogs blor chud /
dgung lo dgu par dga' ldan pho brang du dge legs dpal bzang gis mkhan po dang dge 'dun bstan pa dar rgyas kyis slob dpon lha btsun pas dus bgo ba mdzad de dge tshul gyi sdom pa blangs /
de dang dus mtshungs su tA la'i bsod nams rgya mtshos bsnyen rdzogs kyi sdom pa bzhes /
dgung lo bcu par skyor mo lung gi dgon par skya ser mang po la bsngo ba'i yon bshad dang smon lam sogs bgyis shing dgung na chung yang 'jigs zhum med par spobs pa chen pos chad lhag dang tshig ldab skyon sogs gtan nas med /
dgung lo bcu gcig par byang r+wa sgreng du cha dkar grwa tshang du thos bsam la phebs /
bla ma dam chos dpal 'bar yongs 'dzin du bsten nas bka' gdams pha chos bu chos sogs gsan /
gzhan yang lo rgyus sogs mang po sbyangs /
lo de'i ston khar 'bras spungs su tshur phebs nas rje na ro pa dang mar pa mi la sogs kyi rnam thar la gzigs pas /
chos phyir dka' ba spyad pa rnams mthong ba des thugs 'gyur ba chen po byung ste nga rgyal dang cher rlom sogs chos dang rgyab 'gal yin pas spong dgos 'dug snyam pa dang rang gi bla ma la mos gus rtse gcig byed rgyu ni dam chos kyi rtsa ba red snyam nas rang gi yongs 'dzin rnams la dad pa lhag par 'phel /
r+wa sgreng gi chos grwa der dmangs dkyus ma'i khyur zhugs te slob gnyer byas /
bsdus grwa legs par mkhyen pas skyor dpon mdzad /
de'i dbyar kha nas phar phyin sbyong ba'i 'go tshugs /
de nas 'jam dbyangs 'byung gnas rgyun gyi yongs 'dzin du bsten nas tshad ma'i gzhung chen rnams sbyangs /
de nas mi ring bar rgyu rkyen 'ga'i dbang gis yongs 'dzin 'jam dbyangs 'byung gnas pa chos 'chad 'jog dgos byung bar brten yongs 'dzin dam chos dpal 'bar mdun la mu mthud nas slob gnyer mdzad /
phyis su yongs 'dzin dam chos dpal 'bar r+wa sgreng gi gdan sar phebs pa'i phyag phyir 'brangs /
de nas yongs 'dzin dam chos dpal 'bar gyi bka' ltar r+wa sgreng du cha dkar grwa tshang gi 'gan khur pa bskos /
tA la'i bsod nams rgya mtshos mkhan slob sbrag ma dang lha btsun pas gsang ston /
dge 'dun grangs tshang dbus su ser theg chen gling gi gzim chung du bsnyen rdzogs kyi sdom pa mnos /
grwa tshang gi gdan sa mdzad ring rnam sras kyi thang sku che legs sogs rten bzhengs dang dge 'dun pa'i phogs dang mang ja bcas kyang 'bad med lhun grub tu byung dbu phar 'dul mdzod sogs 'chad nyan legs par mdzad /
chos mtshams rnams su bka' gdams glegs bam pha chos bu chos cha lag bcas pa dang /
dpe chos rin chen spungs pa bcas bshad cing grwa tshang nye skor shing gi ra bskor btsugs pa /
rten gsum gsar bzhengs rnying pa zhig gso sogs byas te grwa tshang de nyid 'phel rgyas su btang /
khong dgung lo nyer gnyis su phebs pa me glang lor tA la'i bsod nams rgya mtsho sog al+than rgyal pos byang phyogs su gdan drangs /
khong yang tA la'i yi phyag phyir byang phyogs su phebs rgyur thag bcad /
grwa tshang gi 'dun tshogs la rjes gnang gi rim pa 'ga' gnang zhor myur du tshur slebs yong ba'i smon lam sogs kun gyi blo kha rdzogs par mdzad /
tshogs pas kyang 'phen yul sras khang bar du skyel ma mdzad /
sa stag lo'i lo 'gor mdo smad byang phyogs su btegs so /
'bri chu brgal te mdo smad chab cha lha khang du al+than rgyal po dang mchod yon zhal 'dzom byung ba dang tA la'i bsod nams rgya mtshos ngo sbyor gnang bar brten rgyal po nas khong la'ang go ming dang tham ga dngos 'bul sogs legs par gnang /
lo de'i ston khar tA la'i byang gam chu'i pho brang du hu du hu zhes pas gdan drangs /
khong gis grwa tshang gsum dang sku rim pa bcas pa'i sgar gyi mgo 'dren pa byas te mtsho sngon sku 'bum dgon du phebs /
lo de'i lo gsar skabs chab cha lha khang du mchod yon lhan rgyas pa'i drung du 'byor /
tA la'i dgung lo so bdun la phebs pa sa mo yos khong dgung grangs nyer bzhi par mdo smad nas khams li thang phyogs la bteg 'dan chos 'khor gling sogs brgyud li thang la 'byor /
der yun ring tsam bzhugs te li thang dgon chen thub bstan byams chen phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i sde btab /
dgon pa'i thig 'debs dang rmang 'ding gi zhabs bkod sogs phal che ba khong gis mdzad /
zla ba gsum tsam tA la'i sku mtshams bzhugs /

mi ring bar go bo dbon po sgar khag gsum gyis gdan 'dren tsha nan zhus par brten rim par 'bri chu brgal te smar khams sgang phyogs su phebs /
tsong kha pa'i dngos slob ba so chos rje'i sprul sku ru grags pa'i lha dbang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpon slob kyis nan chen gsol ba btab par brten chab mdo byams pa gling du phebs /
gos sku chen mo bzhengs pa'i bkod pa gnang /
dge 'dun bstan pa rgya mtshos tA la'i mdun bsnyen rdzogs zhu bar khong gis gsang ston mdzad /
de nas tA la'i nas li thang gi lha chen bzhengs pa dang grwa khang rnams 'debs pa'i don la 'gro dgos pa'i bka' phebs pa dang du blangs te slar li thang la log nas 'bad pa chen pos rten bzhengs dang dgon pa'i lha khang phyi nang gi las ka tshang mar bkod pa mdzad /
lo gsum gyi bar du li thang du bzhugs te dgon pa'i 'gan khur mdzad cing bar lam 'dab sogs su phebs nas zab chos spel /
lam bar 'bul nor byung ba rnams de ga'i dgon pa'i phyogs su btang /
de nas 'dan chos 'khor gling sogs brgyud slar rtsa ba'i bla ma yab sras mjal bar byang phyogs mdo smad du phebs /
skabs der bla ma mjal zhing li thang dgon pa'i gnas tshul zhus pas shin tu thugs dgyes /
mdzo mo mkhar der lha khang gsar bzhengs la ming bde chen ye shes pho brang zhes btags /
tA la'i sku bstod snyan ngag gi lam nas drangs pa dang byams chen sku bstod rang gi rnam thar mdor bsdus bcas brtsams /

byin rlabs gyi gter chen po dpal 'khor lo bde mchog dril bu zhabs lugs kyi bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi snying po'i gnad ston pa dngos grub kun 'byung bzhugs so / /
nA ro chos drug gi khrid dmigs kyi bsdus don yid ches gsum ldan gyi snying po gsang ba'i mdzod brgya 'byed pa'i lde mig ces bya ba bzhugs so / /
bka' gdams thig le bcu drug gi cho ga ngag 'don gyi rim par bsgrigs pa rnams bzhugs so / /
bka' gdams lha chos bdun ldan gyi man ngag zab mo shin tu gsang ba gsal byed rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rnam rgyal stong mchod bya tshul dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo'i mngon dkyil gyi cho ga ngag 'don du bya ba'i rim pa dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa'i bla brgyud bdag bskyed dang bcas pa bzhugs so / /
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa'i sgo nas sbyang chog bya ba'i tshul thar pa'i lam ston zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
yum chen mo dang mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i bsnyen pa byed tshul ma gcig mkha' 'gro'i zhal lung zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rje bla ma la brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi sgo nas byin rlabs ril sgrub bya tshul dngos grub kun 'byung dang rnam 'joms kyi khrus ril sgrub tshul bcas bzhugs so / /
rigs gsum spyi sgrub kyi bla ma'i rnal 'byor 'jam mgon thugs rje'i char rgyun bskul byed sprin gyi sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba sogs bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi rim pa dngos grub kun 'byung bzhugs so / /
bla ma dam pa mang po'i bstod tshogs gsol 'debs phyogs gcig tu bkod pa dngos grub kun 'byung bzhugs so / /
dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyis mdo sngags kyi lam gyi gnad las brtsams pa'i dri ba byung ba'i lan som nyi sel ba'i snang ba dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rje btsun sgrol dkar tshe sbyin yid bzhin 'khor lo'i rjes gnang sogs rjes gnang gi skor rnams bzhugs so / /
chos skyong sgrub skor dngos grub kyi gter mdzod ces bya ba bzhugs so / /
lam gyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa la smon lam du bya ba'i tshul byin brlab spungs zhus kyi don gsal bar ston pa'i man ngag dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
'phrin yig tu tshig sbyor byas pa 'ga' zhig bzhugs so / /

bsngo ba don gnyis lhun grub ces bya ba bzhugs so / /

pa dkar chag bla ma mchod pa'i khrid yig gsang ba'i gnad rnam par phyed pa snyan rgyud man ngag gi gter mdzod ces bya ba bzhugs so / /

rje btsun bla ma grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po blo bzang rnam rgyal gyi gsang ba mchog gi mdzad pa las brtsams te rtogs pa brjod pa dngos grub kyi snye ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /

bla brgyud gsol 'debs kyi rim pa lam mchog sgo 'byed bzhugs so / /

dza dkar chag bzhugs so / /
blo sbyong don bdun ma'i snying po bzhugs so / /
theg pa chen po'i blo sbyong gi khrid yig blo bzang dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rtsom pa po'i lo rgyus nyung bsdus /
rje 'di'i yab ni bod kyi chos rgyal rnams mnga' ris stod du chags nas /
rgyal rabs 'ga' zhig 'das pa na khri kun bzang nyi zla zhes pa byung zhing /
der sras gnyis yod pa'i nang gcig rta nag phud du bzhugs /
phyis su khyim tshang der sa phud nang pa zhes pa'i ming thob /
de rjes gzhung sa'i sku drag tu gyur te rgyal po lha bzang zhabs sdod pa dbang drag bya ba lung kun la blo gros rgyas shing /
drag po'i las la dpa' ba zhig yod /
de la sras gnyis yod pa las tshangs pa dkar po bya ba de rje 'di'i yab rje dam pa'o / /
'jig rten gyi chen po tshangs pa lta bu yod pas na de ltar grags /
des na rus ni chos rgyal gyi gdung rgyud dri ma med pa'o / /
yum ni ngo tsha khrel yod kyi gos kyis klubs shing /
dad pa dang gtong ba'i mthu phul du phyin pa tshe ring dpal 'dzoms zhes bya ba nyid do / /
yab yum de gnyis kyi sras su rab byung bcu gnyis pa'i chu sbrul lor sku bltams /
ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor pa bzang po zhig la phas ming zhus pas /
o rgyan tshe 'phel zhes gsol /
rjes su thos bsam gling chos rje tshe brtan rgyal mtshan gyis o rgyan chos 'phel gsol ba dang chabs gcig skra phud bzhes /
bka' drin can a Ni tshe dbang zhes pa des bu chos byed na ka kha klog dgos zer nas klog rnams a Nis bslabs nas /
ring por ma lon par klog rab tu phyin pa shes /
de nas phas khrid nas bkras lhun drung rams pa kun dga' zer bar dge rgan bsten /
khong gis chos spyod 'dzin skyor gyi skul ma mdzad pas /
chos spyod blo 'dzin gyis rang lo bcu pa chu pho stag lor rgyugs phul /
lo der paN chen blo bzang ye shes drung rab tu byung nas dge tshul gyi sdom pa bzhes /
mtshan ye shes rgyal mtshan gsol /
dang po gsung rab kyi don la thos pa mang du btsal /
de nas thos pa'i don la nges shes bskyed cing /
ji ltar nges pa'i don rnams rgyud la sbyar te bsgoms pa las yang dag pa'i don ji bzhin nges pa'i rtog pa khyad par can rgyud la skye zhes gsungs pa la nges shes 'khrungs te /
dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshe brtan rgyal mtshan bsten nas bsdus grwa nas rnam 'grel gyi gzhung bcas la brtson par mdzad /
skyid grong grub pa'i dbang phyug blo bzang rnam rgyal gyis rnam 'grel rtsa ba dang /
dbu ma 'jug pa gnyis kyi lung dang bka' khrid gnang ba rnams gsan /
dgung lo bcu dgu skabs phur lcog ngag dbang byams pa rin po ches gsung chos gnang ba rnams gsan thog dbu ma phar phyin mdzod 'dul ba rnam 'grel bcas pod lnga'i rtsa ba rnams blo 'dzin gnang /
de dag gi rtsa 'grel rnams dka' chen ye shes thogs med dang tshe brtan rgyal mtshan grub dbang blo bzang rnam rgyal rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen du bsten nas gsan sbyong mdzad /
dgung lo nyi shu rtsa gsum shing yos lor dben pa'i ri khrod du sgrub pa nyams len mdzad rgyur thugs thag bcad de bod zla tshes grub dbang rin po che'i ri khrod du phebs /
zla de'i tshes nyer bdun nyin grub dbang rin po ches mkhan slob sbrags ma dang rdzong dkar 'phel rgyas gling gi dbu mdzad 'dul ba 'dzin pa chen po blo bzang bsod nams kyis gsang ston pa /
mang thos 'dul 'dzin pa dge 'dun rgyal mtshan gyis dus go ba /
kha skong gi dge 'dun bcu tshogs kyi dbus su bsnyen par rdzogs te /
dge slong gi bslab sdom bzhes /
dgung lo nyer gsum nas bzhi bcu zhe gcig par dben pa'i ri khrod du bzhugs nas sgrub pa nyams len gtso bor mdzad /
bar skabs shig nas phur lcog rin po cher gsung chos zhu sar phebs nas jo bor 'byor skabs jo bo'i mdun gtsang dge bshes ye shes dpal 'byor dang /
bkras lhun dka' tshes bzang po bcas nas dung dkar po dri ma med pa zhig phul te /
lam rim bde lam gyi khrid cig dgos tshul nan cher gsol bas byams mgon rin po che'i bka' bcas la brten 'bras spus gtsang ba'i spyi khang du dge bshes sum cu skor la bde lam gyi bka' 'khrid zhag nyi shu skor gnang ba'i mjug tu sems bskyed mchod pa rgyas pa zhig byas /
de ni lam rim gyi 'khrid gnang ba'i thog ma red 'dug dga' bzhi gung paN+Di ta'i thugs bzhed ltar khong dang lcang bde ldan sgron ma sku zhang skyes nyug chos mdzad 'bras gtsang dge bshes dpal 'byor gyis dge bshes brgya tsam la bla mchod kyi 'khrid cig kyang gnang /
de nas dkar gyi mkha' 'gro'i gsang phug tu phebs nas sgrub pa sngar bzhin mdzad /
de nas gangs khur mo'i mgul dang mkha' 'gro ma bye ba 'bum sde'i tshogs khang /
rdo a ru ra'i phug sogs su gsang stabs kyis phebs nas gnas der ting nge 'dzin shin tu 'phel bar gyur /
phyis gnas der sems bskyed sgang du grags /
de rjes bal yul du phebs nas zla ba bdun bzhugs te /
sngar gyi bzhugs gnas dkar mkha' 'gro'i gsang phug tu tshur byon /
de nas dus re zhig na sngags rams pa ye shes skal ldan snyun gyis zin /
khong ni bla ma grub pa'i dbang phyug gi sras kyi thu bo dang rje rang nyid nas kyang chos gsan pa'i bla ma song gshis chu sprel zla bcu gnyis pa'i nang ma Ni la khar phebs /
sngags rams pa ye shes skal ldan gyis rten 'brel kyang bsgrigs /
de nas rje rang nyid sa paN la 'jam dbyangs zhal gzigs pa'i gnas spang shing gi lha lnga phug dang /
rje red 'da' ba'i sgrub gnas me tog mdangs chen rje mi la'i sgrub gnas ra ma byang chub rdzong /
brag dkar rta so dbu ma rdzong sogs su phebs sgrub pa la rtse gcig tu gzhol bar mdzad /
de nas chu bya lor ma Ni la khar phebs /
sngon 'bul ba rnams mi bzhes kyang /
'di nas bzung 'bul sbyor byung ba tshang ma bzhes nas bstan 'gro'i don du sbyor bar mdzad /
'di nas phur lcog rin po che sogs kyi bka' bzhin gzhan la gsung chos gnang ba gtso bor mdzad de /
gzhan la dge ba'i bag chags ci thebs mdzad /
slob ma yang gsung chos gnang thengs rer stong lhag tsam re 'dus pas sku tshe 'di la slob ma chig 'bum lhag tsam byung yod /
chu stag lor tA la'i bla ma sku phreng brgyad pa'i yongs 'dzin gnang dgos phebs kyang rje 'di ni chen po'i go sa la gtan nas mi dgyes pas dgongs pa zhus kyang dgongs pa ma 'khrol bas lo bcu gnyis bar tA la'i brgyad pa'i yongs 'dzin gnang dgos byung /
tA la'i yongs 'dzin gnang bar gong ma chan lung shin tu dgyes te /
legs so'i rten dang bcas gser gyi bka' lung phebs pa ni 'di ltar /
tshe ring gnam gyi she mong btsan pos 'dzam gling yangs pa'i sa chen por stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba hwang di'i bka' /
dka' chen ye shes rgyal mtshan la phab pa /
da cha tA la'i bla ma'i mdun du chos ston pa'i bla ma 'os pa'i rgyu mtshan bod na yod pa'i am ban nas zhus byung ba nged kyang thos ma thag spro ba rgya cher 'phel /
khyed ni chos la gzhol ba'i rtogs ldan gyi bla ma chen po slob gnyer la hur thag bskyed pa'i grags pa sngar mor lcang skya ho thog thu'u nas zhus byung ba nged kyi blo la yod /
da lam bdag rkyen bstsal nas tA la'i bla ma'i dge rgan du bskos te paN+Di ta'i cho lo gnang ba yin /

dper na /

khrom khri dpon /

gsang 'dus rgyud 'grel /

sgom rim /

kha bka' drin gsum ldan gyi bla ma rdo rje 'chang ma hA paN+Di ta rje btsun blo bzang dam chos rgya mtsho'i gsung 'bum kha pa'i dkar chag bzhugs so / /

ston pa mchog gi skyes rabs so bzhi pa'i snang brnyan ji ltar bzhengs pa'i tshul cung zad bkod pa zla shel gsar pa'i myu gu zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /

dpal ldan bla ma dam pa gnas lnga gzigs pa'i ma hA paN+Di ta dA na'i mtshan can gyi rnam par thar pa'i cha shas tsam tshigs bcad du bsdebs pa dad gus padmo bzhad pa'i nyin byed zhwa ser bstan pa'i mdzes rgyan mtsho byung phang 'gro'i dbyangs snyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /

phywa phrin nor bu'i mchog rgyal sa lugs ltar gtong tshul 'dod dgu rab gsal bzhugs so / /
rje btsun sgrol ma la brten pa'i mdos kyi cho ga g.yul bzlog gi yi ge dpal sa skya'i phur sgrub chen mo'i 'chams sogs kyi skabs su nye bar mkho ba phyag len mdzes rgyan bzhugs so / /
phur sgrub slob dpon gyi byed sgo zur 'debs dge rdo rje gur gyi mgon mdos bskang gso zur bsgrigs /

mgon po'i mdos gtor gyi dus tshigs /
sa glang dmar chen gtor bzlog mdzad skabs kyi phyag len ltar bya tshul sngags skad mgul rgyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal rdo rje gzhon nu'i byin dbab kyi rol yig mthong ba rang grol gsal byed mdzes rgyan bzhugs so / /

rgyan mchog dus mchod dpyad khra /
bka' 'gyur rin po che zhag bzhi tshugs dus kyi dpyad khra /

bris ma /
ca dpal sa skya pa chen po sngags 'chang bla ma thams cad mkhyen pa ngag dbang kun dga' blo gros sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i gsung rab po ti ca pa'i dkar chag  phyag na rdo rje 'chi bdag 'joms pa'i bdag bskyed 'chi med snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /

khyung nag gi rjes gnang bzhugs so / /

me dbang 'byung 'dul rjes gnang bzhugs so / /

rig byed ma'i gnad yig gsal byed bzhugs so / /

dus 'khor bla ma'i rnal 'byor /

bod kyi mkhas pa snga phyi dag gi grub mtha'i shan 'byed mtha' dpyod dang bcas pa'i 'bel ba'i gtam skyes dpyod ldan mkhas pa'i lus rgyan rin chen mdzes pa'i phra tshom bkod pa bcas bzhugs so / /
rtsom pa po'i lo rgyus nyung bsdus /
ngag dbang chos grags ni gtsang dpal ldan sa skya'i nub byang gi phyogs su le dbar bcu gnyis tsam gyi sar sems cher zhes bya ba'i yul du yab gso ba rig pa sogs lugs gnyis la mkhyen spyan yangs pa sman pa phun tshogs zhes pa dang /
yum phan thogs skyid gnyis kyi sras su rab byung bcu pa'i chu sprel lo'i zla ba bcu gnyis par 'khrungs /
byis pa'i dus klog sbyor sogs sbyangs /
dgung lo bcu gcig par yab dang lhan cig chos 'khor lhun por lo gcig tsam bzhugs ring bshes gnyen mkhan po ngag dbang grags pa'i mdun chos 'ga' zhus /
sku zhang drin chen zhig yod pa des grogs mdzad de thub bstan yangs pa can gyi chos grwar zhugs /
spyan snga dkon mchog rgya mtsho'i drung du dge tshul bsgrubs /
mtshan ngag dbang chos grags zhes pa bstsal /

thub bstan tshogs chen gyi slob dpon dbang phyug dpal bzang dge rgan gyi gtso bor bsten nas /
phar tshad /
dbu ma /
'dul mdzod /
bshes springs /
spyod 'jug sogs gzhung lugs mang por thos bsam mthil phyin mdzad /

kun gyis legs so'i me tog gter /
dgung lo bcu dgu par /
gdan sa chen po dpal ldan sa skya dang /
ngam ring chos sde sogs su rab 'byams grwa skor la byon /
snga na med pa'i legs bshad kyi dga' ston rgya cher spel bas mkhas pa'i grags pa dbus gtsang kun tu khyab /
mang mkhar ri bor slob bshad nor bu gling gi dben gnas su byon te /
mkhas dbang klu sgrub rgya mtsho'i zhabs pad yun ring bsten nas /
gsang sngags kyi chos rgya cher gsan cing /
khyad par dpal ldan sa skya'i yab chos man ngag dang bcas pa rdzogs par gsan /
klu sgrub rgya mtsho ni khong gi bka' chos zhu yul gyi bla ma gtso bo zhig tu gyur /
dgung lo nyer dgu par /
karma pa zhwa dmar sprul pa'i sku chos kyi dbang phyug 'khor tshogs rgya mtsho lta bu dang bcas gtsang ngam ring chos sde chen por chibs kyi kha lo bsgyur ba na /
byang pa rgyal po mchod yon bka' bgros te /
ngag chos dgung na gzhon yang sku yon che bas las chen slob dpon du bskos shing /
karma par sne len dang chos kyi bgros gleng yang mdzad /
zhwa dmar sprul skus thugs dgyes pa chen pos bstod mngags mdzad /
de nas sa skya sngags 'chang mthu stobs dbang phyug bsod nams chos 'phel gyi zhabs drung du dbang lung man ngag bcas gsang sngags kyi zab chos mtha' yas pa gsan /
dgung lo sum cu par mkhan chen lung rigs dbang phyug la lam 'bras cha tshang gsan /
dgung lo so lnga pa me pho rta lor bsam 'grub dgon gsar du skyes chen blo gros rgyal mtshan gyi gdan sar bzhugs so / /
de nas bzung sku ma 'das bar dgon de'i bdag po mdzad /

phyag rgya chen po /

bshes gnyen mkhan po mtha' yas dang /

sa lo 'jam dbyangs kun dga' bsod nams ni /

ngor e waM chos ldan du rje btsun rdo rje 'chang dkon mchog 'phel bas mkhan po dang glo bo mkhan chen pas slob dpon mdzad nas dge tshul dang rab byung gi sdom pa bzhes /

slar bod du phebs /
chu pho stag gi lo zla ba bcu gcig pa'i tshes gnyis la mtshur mdo bo lung gi gtsug lag khang du zhwa dmar cod pan 'dzin pa brgyad pa dpal chen chos kyi don grub kyis mkhan slob sbrags ma dang /

mog ca 'jam dbyangs rgya mtsho bsten nas rig pa'i gnas kyi gtso bo gzhung lugs chen po rnams la slob gnyer gnang /

drang nges rnam 'byed yang dag mtha'i sems bskyed kyi bgro gleng rim par gnang yang khas len ma shor bas thugs dgyes /
gral mgor bzhag nas gsol zhal zho'i bkang ba gnang ste phor ba de'i nang du 'thung gsungs da phyin chad nga rgyal ma byed ces bka' phebs /
me lug lor dbyar chos skabs su 'bras spungs spyi'i chos su rdo gcal chen mor drangs nges dang dbu ma'i thal zlog gi tshogs langs byas /
dpal ldan smad rgyud grwa tshang du zhugs nas gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa la bag chags 'jog rgyu'i re ba yod kyang zhabs phyi pa'i bar chad kyis phebs ma thub /
slar yang grogs ngan des sum pa khu dbon dang khong gnyis bar mi rigs pa mang du byas kyang sdig pa 'dag pa'i mthun rkyen du gyur /
grogs ngan de la zhon rta gon pa lam chas byin nas rang yul du rdzongs /
de nas bzung mthun rkyen ha cang dkon por gyur /
nyin mtshan rgyun 'khyongs kyis skyo ngal med par slob gnyer sha stag gnang /
lcang skya ngag dbang chos ldan la bde mchog lu hi pa dang dril bu pa kun rig bcas kyi dbang gsan /
shar rtse mkhan chen nam mkha' bzang po la lam rim chen mo'i khrid dang bde lam nyams khrid sems bskyed 'bogs chog gsang 'dus 'grel ba bzhi sbrags kyi bshad pa du ma dang bka' 'gyur pa dam chos rin chen la gsung 'bum gyi lung dang mnga' ris pa blo bzang yar 'phel la ba ri brgya rtsa mgon chen bcu gsum sogs kyi rjes gnang dang pra ti rin chen don grub dang de'i slob ma smon lam lhun grub la dbyangs can sgra mdo dang sku 'bum bsod nams la sum rtags kyi khrid /
rgyud smad slob dpon pa tsa grags pa lhun grub la lany+dza wartul mchod rten thig rtsa gzab gshar 'bri tshul sogs legs par sbyangs /
sog po rab 'byams pa ngag dbang rgya mtsho la lnga bsdus sogs dang 'bras spungs sman rams pa la nag rtsis bcas gsan /
dgung lo nyer lngar phebs pa na grogs gnyis dang bcas ldom bu pa'i spyod pas bsam yas zangs ri mkhar dmar dwags la sgam po de wi ko Ti sogs la gnas mjal du byon slar yang 'bras spungs su byon tshe bka' blon tshos pho lha tha'i ji'i steng du dmod bzlog byed pa dang thug gtsang dang la dwags mnga' ri pa'i dmag lha sa dang nye bar byung bas /
bka' blon tshos ser 'bras kyi grwa pa rnams dmag la 'gro dgos zhes bka' byung /
ha cang dza drag che ba'i dus der khong gis sku srog la ma ltos par nged grwa pa rnams shul lam ring mo nas brgyud de rgyal ba yab sras zhal mjal gsung thos dang slob gnyer dpyis phyin pa byas nas bslab sdom bsrung ba las g.yul 'gyed pa lta zhog srin bu phra mo tshun la'ang srog gcod bsam pa med 'on kyang gong sa thams cad mkhyen pa'i zhabs tog dang grwa sa'i la rgyar mi gnod pa zhig nges par yod na dmag dpon la nga rang 'gro chog ces khas blangs /
gtam des ser dmag 'gro rgyu de bshol thub song /
yin na'ang log sems 'chang ba'i mi rnams kyis khong la zas ngan drangs pas smyung gzhi drag po byung /
wa shus sman pa blo bzang dga' ba zhes par bsten nas rim gyis dug nad las grol /
mi dbang pho lha tha'i ji'i mchog nas bdag rkyen du khong 'bras yul skyid tshal dgon pa'i mkhan po bskos nas bka' shog dang tham ka gnang /
'bras yul skyid tshal dgon du lo gnyis tsam bzhugs nas pho lha mi dbang la mkhan po'i dgongs pa zhus /
dgon lung du dpe cha po ti bcu phrag lnga lhag dang gyon pa ca lag rten gsum zhal 'bag sogs rdzong bda' gnang /
de ltar dbus gtsang du phyin pa'i 'dun ma legs par grub nas lcags phag lo'i zla ba gnyis par rtsa ba'i yongs 'dzin mkhan chen nam mkha' bzang po dang rgyud pa slob dpon zhwa dmar shes rab rgya mtsho sogs la thon phyag dang 'di phyi'i skyabs 'jug zhus te grogs mi bcu bdun dang lhan du zhabs rkyang du byon /
rta bsu dang bsu ston gyi rim pa du mas sdun bsus te zla ba brgyad pa'i tshes brgyad la dgon lung du phebs /
der lam rim chen mo'i bka' chos dang la mo dgon du nyin gsum la dam bca' bzhag mchog sprul bstan pa'i nyi ma la bka' gdams thig le bcu drug sogs kyi dbang zhus /
slob dpon smon lam dpal 'byor las gsang 'dus sogs dbang du ma zhus /
dngos po yod dgu bla ma rje'i zhabs tog tu phul /
de nas sku yul du phebs te rgas gzhon thams cad dga' mgu la longs su spyod par byas te slar yang dgon lung ri khrod du phyir phebs /
dga' ldan rin chen gling du ser skya lnga brgya lhag la sta gon dang bcas pa'i mi dra brgya rtsa'i dbang bstsal /
dpa' ri'i bkra shis chos gling pas gdan zhus ltar mgon po phyag drug pa'i zhal thang bris /
phyi nang gsang ba'i rten tshul mthun bsgrubs /
sngags rams pa slob dpon 'byung gnas la sku lnga'i gtor chog tshe dpag lha dgu'i dbang gcod dbang nam mkha' sgo 'byed sogs du ma zhus gcod kyi cho ga bris chos rgyal gyi gtor chen 'dzugs phyag len dang gar 'cham bcas zha lu pa'i rtsa tshig ltar gsar 'dzugs gnang /
sku 'bum pa shes rab chos 'byor dang sku 'bum rgyud pa'i mkhan po blo bzang kun dga' sogs la sa skya'i gser chos skor dang gsang 'dus rdzogs rim blo sbyong don bdun ma sogs gsan /
sku 'bum khri pa dge 'dun don 'grub la dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dbang zhus /
ser lung dgon pa'i g.yas ngos su ri khrod dga' ldan chos rdzong btab /
ser lung dgon dang hor rgya bod gsum gyi yon bdag rnams la rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur mdzad /
bkra shis chos lung dang ser lung gnyis kyi khri pa'i dgongs pa zhus /
khong dgung lo so gsum lon pa 'brug lor rgya nag rgyal po chan lung gi gser yig pa 'byor /
spyi lo me sbrul lo'i zla ba dang po'i yar tshes la bla ma lnga dang grwa pa nyer lnga bcas dpon g.yog so gcig rgya nag pe cin du phebs /
rgyal po chan lung lcang skya rin po che dga' ldan gser khri sprul sku rnams mjal kha zhus /
sa rta lo'i dpyid ka zhabs mi bde ba byung nas dgongs pa zhus /
lam du rlung lhags kyis mnar bas gdong dang lag pa nag por song ba wang gi mas mkhyen nas khyod la bro nad chen pos zin 'dug gnas skabs rang yul log chog ces bka' thob /
pe cing nas thon rjes sa 'gul chen po byung nas nying sha mkhar zhig sa lug lo zla ba gnyis pa'i tshes gsum nyin dgon lung du 'byor /
lcags sprel lor snon zla'i nang khong gis sbyin bdag mdzad nas mchod rten gser rtsi can khru gsum pa dang dgon lung ri khrod dang zhwa khog gi bde skyid sgrub sde gnyis kyi 'dus khang dang lha khang dga' ldan rtse bzhengs /
mar tshang gi lha khang sogs zhig gsos gnang /
slar yang bkra shis chos lung dang ser lung dgon gyi khri pa byas /
dgon lung gi 'dus khang zhig gsos dang ma pham pa'i sku sman 'jim gyi 'bur bzo chen po dang mchod rten 'dom bcu gsum par rab gnas bcas legs par grub /
thu'u kwan sprul ba'i sku la skyabs 'gro dang dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sgo nas bar ma rab byung bsgrub /
dgung lo so dgu pa chu khyi lor rgyal po'i bka' bzhin dgu pa'i nyer gnyis nyin rgyal sa pe cing pho brang du byon /
bcu pa'i tshes lnga la gong ma mjal /
mchod rten rtse lngar grags pa'i lha khang du bzhugs so / /
phyi lo sa chu ma 'phrod pas nad ro langs nas yun ring bsnyung /
hor zla bzhi pa'i nang rgyal pos gtan du pha yul log chog pa'i dgongs khrol gnang bas bya rnyi las thar ba bzhin dgon lung du yar byon /
po shog thu'i dgon du lha khang gsar rgyag mdzad /
nang rten rje tsong kha pa sogs kyi 'jim sku gser tshon ma legs par bzhengs /
dgung lo zhe gsum pa me stag lor zla ba gsum pa'i nang dgon lung gi khri pa'i 'gan khur gnang /
dga' ldan chos 'khor gling du ser skya bdun brgya la bcu gcig zhal gyi dbang lung bstsal /
gzhis dgon du cho 'phrul smon lam gsar 'dzugs gnang /
lcang skya rin po che'i bka' ltar dgon lung du sgra'i mtshams sbyor lnga pa sogs dang sum rtags snyan dngags rtsis sman sogs khrid pa'i gzhi btsugs /
dgung lo zhe bzhi pa rab byung bcu gsum pa'i me yos lor dge ldan rtsis gsar ma bu phyi mo chos 'byung yongs 'dus ljon bzang sogs brtsams te par du brkos /
dga' ldan bde chen gling gi 'dus khang gsar bzhengs kyi rgyu bdag mdzad /
bshad sgrub dar rgyas gling gi khri pa zla ba gcig mdzad de 'dus khang gi steng shod zhig gsos gnang /
arnye sman rams pa nyi ma rgyal mtshan la dpal ldan rgyud bzhi'i lung dang sngo sman ngos 'dzin yan chad kyi khrid zhib rgyas gsan /
phyis ching gi rgyal po'i gdan 'dren byung bas der rnam g.yeng dang le lo med par phyogs so so nas byon pa'i lha sde mi sde du ma la mtshan nyid bsdus grwa dang sgra gso ba snyan ngag sdeb sbyor rtsis sogs kyis khrid 'dod mos ltar gnang /
dad ldan gyis bstabs pa'i dngos rdzas kyis dgon lung lha khang gsar bzhengs dang phyi nang gi mtshon mdangs yongs rdzogs khong gis bris /
dngos po yod dgu rtsal sprugs kyis dbus su mchod pa'i rten du bskur /
ri mo sbyangs pa'i 'bras bur rdul mtshon la brten pa'i dus 'khor lha mang gi dkyil 'khor bzhengs /
khong gis khri pa lo bcu byas ring grwa chung tshun la chad las chen po dang gnas dbyung btang ba sogs mdzad ma myong /
zur du gzhan nor dar kha gang mi len par drang po'i gzhung bsrangs so / /
rab byung sgrub pa yang drug brgya kha lhag byung /
lcang skya rin po che la bde mchog gi dbang zhus /
gsang mtshan rol pa'i rdo rje gsol /
dgung lo drug cu re drug pa sa glang lor dbus su phebs /
grwa pa dang rgyud grwa tshang ma mnyam tshogs kyi dbur phyin /
khrom pa phon che ba la lam rim gyi khrid tshe dpag lha dgu'i dbang gnang /
khyad par tshig 'phri skam po min par dka' gnad kyi don la bgro gleng yang yang mdzad /
mkhas btsun bzang po'i snyan grags kyis phyogs kun tu khyab /
slar yang dgon lung du phebs mdo sngags kyi dbang lung sgra dang sum rtags snyan ngag sdeb sbyor gso dpyad rtsis dkar nag sogs gdul bya rnams kyi 'dod mos ltar sku tshegs la mi gzigs par dgung lo gya bzhi'i bar slob khrid gnang /
dgung lo gya bzhi pa me mo lug gi lo'i zla ba dang po'i tshes bco brgyad nas snyun tshul bstan /
sa pho sprel lo'i zla dang po'i tshes nyer drug nyin pa'i snga mor sku'i bkod pa bsdus so / /
khong gi slob ma ni thu'u bkwan chos kyi nyi ma dang gro tshang brag rin po che dang paN+Di ta chos rje blo bzang lhun grub sogs mkhas btsun bzang po mang du byung /
gsung chos kyang rgya dkar nag bod sog bcas la dam chos ji ltar dar tshul dang gso rig skar rtsis sku gzugs kyi chags tshad mtsho sngon gyi lo rgyus yi ge'i bshad pa sogs po ti brgyad du bsdus te /

dgung na byis pa'i dus su tA la'i brgyad pa 'jam dpal rgya mtsho dang paN chen bdun pa bstan pa'i nyi ma gnyis nas seng chen sku rabs gnyis pa blo bzang dpal 'byor gyi yang srid du ngos 'dzin /

lo de'i zla ba bzhi pa'i tshes bzhi nyin par thos bsam gling gi mkhan po chos 'phel don grub la dge tshul gyi sdom pa zhus shing rdo rje 'dzin pa sngags chen blo bzang tshe brtan gyi drung nas 'jigs byed lha bcu gsum ma'i dbang sogs thog mar zhus /
thos bsam gling gi grwa tshang du lo bcu gnyis ring dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po bsten nas mdo phyogs kyi gzhung lugs chen po rnams la thos bsam mthil phyin mdzad de mkhas pa'i dbang por gyur cing dgung lo bcu dgur phebs pa na dka' chen gyi ming btags legs par blangs /

bskyed rdzogs kyi skor la yang 'bad brtson gyis bag chags ci thebs mdzad /

de ltar lo bcu phrag 'ga'i ring mu mthud pas sog po mkhan chen no min han blo bzang tshe dbang dang dbus gtsang khams gsum gyi mkhan slob dge ba'i gshes gnyen mang po khong gi slob mar gyur /

dpal rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas lho sgo bya tshul sdig sgrib kun 'joms zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /

khrag 'thung padma drag po la brten pa'i gtor bzlog bya tshul gyi zur 'debs khrigs rim dang bcas pa ngar ldan spu gri'i 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu'i thod sgrub kyi rgyun khyer cho ga bzhugs so / /
dpal ldan sa skya'i drag 'bar gsang sgrub kyi cho ga'i 'don 'grigs nag 'gros su bkod pa bzhugs so / /
mgon po gtor chen gyi 'don 'grigs bzhugs so / /
dpal myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po nang sgrub rgyan can la brten pa'i bzlog pa stobs chen shugs bzlog gi chog bsgrigs ngar ldan mtshon cha zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
ye shes kyi bsrung ma mgon chos lha gsum la tshogs mchod 'bul tshul dngos grub 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bde mchog gi bka' bsrung mgon po phyag bzhi ba /
zhal bzhi pa /
dur bdag rnam gsum gyi gtor bsngo dang /
dregs pa lcam sring dang rnam sras gnyis kyi stabs gtor dang bcas pa bzhugs so / /
dam can rdo rje legs pa'i gtor 'bul gnyer gtad dang dge 'dun 'dus pa'i g.yang 'bod dang bcas pa bzhugs so / /
bka' bsrung skyes bu chen po dam can nor sgrub la brten pa'i cho ga'i 'don 'grigs bzhugs so / /
bka' bsrung rdo rje legs pa'i bsnyen sgrub las gsum bya tshul dgra bgegs g.yul las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bka' bsrung dam can skyes bu chen po'i mdos gzhung gi zur 'debs bzhugs so / /
rgyal ba'i lung zin chos sde chen po sku 'bum byams pa gling gi gzhi bdag le'u che'i gsol mchod cha lag dang bcas pa dgos 'dod 'jo ba'i yid bzhin lcags kyu zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
'go ba'i lha lnga'i rten 'dzugs kyi cho ga dge mtshan g.yung drung 'khyil pa'i gter mdzod ces bya ba bzhugs so / /
rma chen spom ra la gshegs gtor 'bul tshul zag med bdud rtsi zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
lab tse dang dgra lha'i ka 'dzugs zung 'brel gyi gsol mchod 'dod thabs yid 'ong mchod sprin zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
byang phyogs khal kha'i yul gyi 'od gsol ri bo'i gnas skyong rdo rje 'od ldan gyi gsol mchod bdud rgyal dung gi sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
sme bdun skar ma mchod tshul bkra shis myu gu zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgo nas dge 'dun 'dus pa'i 'khor lo bsgrub pa'i ngag bzhugs so / /
rlung rta'i ka 'dzugs bsod nams dpal skyed kyi zur 'debs legs tshogs 'bras kyi snye ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rgyal po sde lnga'i tshogs mchod kyi khrigs rim sid+d+hi 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rgyal po sku lnga'i nang rten rgyal mtshan sgrub pa'i cho ga'i ngag 'don nag 'gros su bkod pa chos bsrung dgyes pa'i bzhad sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dga' gdong yon tan rgyal po la stabs gtor 'bul tshul dpa' bo rol pa'i gad rgyang zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
gsung rgyal gyi bka' blon rdo rje grags ldan la mchod gtor 'bul tshul rngams chen rol pa'i gad rgyang zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bstan bsrung sprul pa'i chos rgyal rdo rje grags ldan la gtang rag 'bul tshul bstan bsrung dgyes pa'i rol gar zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal ldan dmag zor rgyal mo'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus bzhugs so / /
dpal ldan lha mo'i tshogs mchod /
dpal mgon zhal bzhi bar gser skyems dang tshogs mchod /
dam can la gsung mchod dang bcas 'bul ba'i tshul bde chen sprin phung zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
slob dpon chen po wa pa dmar pos mdzad pa'i dpal ldan lha mo'i sgrub gzhung gi mchan 'grel snying thig gsang ba'i brda skad ces bya ba bzhugs so / /
bstan bsrung gnod sbyin chen po bse khrab can la brten pa'i brdab gtor bya tshul rdo rje pha lam zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
gnod sbyin chen po lcam sring gi glo bur las bcol la nye bar mkho ba'i zur 'debs dam nyams kyi snying khrag 'byin pa'i chu srin sder mo zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rtsom pa po'i lo rgyus nyung bsdus /
rje 'di nyid mtsho sngon zhing chen hang krung rdzong khongs ar tsha zhes par dpon gyi rus can yab rta mgrin dang /
yum tshe mdo gnyis kyi sras su rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i shing sbrul lo'i hor zla bcu pa'i tshes bco lnga la ngo mtshar ba'i ltas du ma dang bcas sku bltams /
gser khang rdo rje 'chang gis gser tog sprul skur ngos 'dzin gnang zhing /
rje de nyid las dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa mnos /
mtshan blo bzang thub bstan rgya mtsho zhes bstsal /
lo de'i zla ba lnga par gser tog dgon du gdan sar bkod /
dgung lo lnga pa la rnal 'byor pa chen po skal bzang grags pa dge rgan du bsten nas chos spyod du ma thugs 'dzin mdzad /
bdun pa la chu bzang rin po che las rab byung dang dge tshul gyi sdom pa bzhes te /
blo bzang tshul khrims chos grags zhes mtshan gnang /
brgyad pa la rje sku 'bum du gser tog sgar bar zhabs pad bkod cing /
chos skyong gi lung phebs bzhin dgung lo nyer gnyis pa'i bar du rje nya kyA ngag dbang chos grags yongs 'dzin du bsten nas phar tshad kyi gzhung mang po thugs 'dzin dang dpe khrid rim bzhin mdzad /
thun mong pa'i rig gnas kyang dpyis phyin par sbyangs /
khrid dang rjes gnang sogs gsang sngags gdams pa'i skor mtha' yas pa mnos /
bcu gsum par mkhas mang bye ba'i bsti gnas byams pa gling gi tshogs chen dang /
dpal ldan bshad sgrub gling gi chos grwar zhugs /
de nas bzung lo drug gi ring la grwa rkyang dkyus ma'i ngang tshul gyis tshogs chen dang chos grwa la chag med phebs /
'dzin skyor sbyangs dang tshogs gleng snga phyir rigs pa'i dka' gnad mtha' dag la gzhan dring mi 'jog pa'i spobs pa brnyes pa'i mkhas pa'i grags pa rgyas /
gzhan yang /
lo bcu bzhi'i yun la 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i thugs bcud dben sa snyan brgyud las 'ongs pa'i gdams pa mtha' yas pa bum pa gang byo'i tshul du gsan bzhes mdzad /
dgung lo nyi shu pa la shing bza' rdo rje 'chang las bsnyen rdzogs bzhes /
de'i phyi lor rgyud grwar zhugs te /
rgyud kyi phyag bzhes thams cad thugs la chub par mdzad cing phyi lo nas rgyud pa'i khrir 'khod /
spyir dgung lo nyer bdun nas so gcig gi bar dang /
re lnga pa nas lo ngo gsum bcas sku 'bum byams pa gling gi chos khrir snga phyir bkod /
phyi ma ni rgyal dbang bcu gsum pa chen po'i bkas bsko bzhag mdzad /
so bdun par bya khyung theg chen yon tan bstan rgyas gling gi chos khrir bzhugs pa bcas kyi skabs grwa tshang rang rang gi 'chad nyan chos spyod mtha' dag bstan pa'i dmigs rkyen du 'gro nges pa gnang /
gzhan yang /
dgung lo so gcig pa dang /
so dgu nga lnga pa bcas la se chen cang jun pE li dang /
u cu mu chen wang gis gdan zhus bzhin byang phyogs hal ha'i yul du lan gsum la chibs bskyod /
bar ma'i skabs tA khu rel du rje btsun dam par mjal /
skabs 'di dag tu pe cin dang /
ri bo rtse lngar gnas gzigs dang rten mjal gang rgyas zhus /
lam bar rnams su dad ldan ser skya so sor 'dod chos kyi re ba bskangs /
dgung lo re brgyad pa nas sku 'bum 'du khang chen mo me dgras 'jig pa nyams gso'i khur mtha' dag gi gtso 'gan bzhes te /
lo gsum dang phyed na yongs su sor chud mdzad pa sogs sde 'dir chos srid kyi bka' drin dpag par dka' ba gnang /
spyir rje 'dis yongs 'dzin rnam gnyis /
dka' chen byang chub rin chen bzang po /
bla brang sgo mang rin po che sogs bshes gnyen chen po bcu drug tsam bsten te /
gzhung lugs mtha' dag gdams par shar ba nges don mkhas pa chen po'i go 'phang la dbang bsgyur cing /
dbang lung zab khrid sogs man ngag rgya mtsho'i gter du gyur /
zhal slob kyang stong 'khor ho thog thu dang /
rgya yag tshang sogs nyi zla lta bus dbu mdzad stod smad bar gsum nas bgrang las 'das pa byung /
gzhan yang /
dge 'dun gyi sde du mar bsnyen bkur dang mchod bshams /
rten gsum bzhengs pa sogs bsam las 'das pas dad ldan 'das gson gyi dad rdzas chud mi 'dza' bar mdzad de /
dgung lo don gcig pa shing yos lo'i hor zla bcu gnyis pa'i nyer lnga la zhabs skyil krung dang bcas gzugs sku'i bkod pa bsdu bar mdzad do / /
gsung 'bum pod bcu gsum tsam yod skad kyang nged dpe mdzod khang du pod lnga kho na bzhugs so / /
@# / /
bse ngag dbang bkra shis kyi gsung 'bum / /
par ma /
ka zab mo rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtha' dpyod legs par bshad pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
zhugs pa dang gnas pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnam gzhag mtha' dpyod skal bzang 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
par ma /
kha rje btsun tsong kha pa chen pos thub dbang mnyam med shAkya thub pa la rten 'byung zab mo gsungs pa'i sgo nas bstod pa legs par bshad pa'i snying po'i tshig don lam gyi rim par bsgrigs pa thar 'dod 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bsam gzugs kyi mtha' dpyod legs bshad mdzod kyi sgo 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so / /
dbu ma'i thal bzlog bzhugs so / /
'jam dbyangs bla ma ngag dbang bkra shis pas gnang ba'i dris lan snying gi mun sel zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rje thams cad mkhyen pa 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes gsungs pa'i blo rig gi zur rgyan blo gsal blo gros kyi padma bzhad pa'i legs bshad nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba khri chen ngag dbang bkra shis kyis mdzad pa bzhugs so / /
blo rig gi mtha' dpyod legs bshad mkhas pa'i mgul rgyan bzhugs so / /
rtags rigs kyi rang lugs mtha' dpyod blo gsal mkhas pa'i mgul rgyan 'gro ba'i snying gi mun pa sel bar byed pa ku mu ta'i kha 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so / /
'phrin las kyi rnam gzhag blo gsal 'jug ngogs rin chen them skas zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
par ma /
ga bsdus grwa'i dgag sgrub legs bshad mkhas pa'i yid 'phrog ces bya ba 'jam mgon bla ma ngag dbang bkra shis dpal bzang pos mdzad pa bzhugs so / /
theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rgyan gyi zin bris theg mchog gsal ba'i nyi ma bzhugs so / /
dbu ma'i zin bris nor bu'i 'phreng mdzes zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dgag bya ngos 'dzin gyi bshad pa'i zin bris mkhas pa dgyes pa'i yid 'phrog bzhugs so / /
blo rig gi dka' gnas la ljags bshad gnang ba'i zin bris bzhugs so / /
rten 'brel gyi gsung sgros thor bu bzhugs so / /
phar phyin zur bkol bzhi'i skor las drang nges mtha' dpyod kyi gsung bshad zin bris bzhugs so / /
dbu ma lung rigs gter mdzod kyi gsung bshad zin bris bzhugs so / /
par ma /
nga tshad ma'i dgongs 'grel gyi bstan bcos chen po rnam 'grel gyi don gcig tu dril ba blo rab 'bring tha gsum du ston pa legs bshad chen po mkhas pa'i mgul rgyan skal bzang re ba kun skong zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bsdus grwa rtsom pa po'i lo rgyus nyung bsdus /
'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i thugs sras bse ngag dbang bkra shis ni /
mdo smad gser ljongs reb gong gi yul gyi bye brag bse'i nya lung zhes par yab rin chen skyabs dang yum snying mo byams gnyis kyi sras su rab byung bcu gcig pa'i sa pho rta lo la sku bltams /
byis pa'i dus nas rtsis pa zhig gis ser gos gon dgos zer bar brten grwa pa'i gos kho na gyon /
mi ring bar skal ldan rgya mtsho'i slob ma mgar gong tshe brtan rgya mtsho'i drung du rab tu byung zhing dge tshul gyi sdom pa mnos /
mtshan sbyin pa rgya mtsho zhes btags /
dgung lo bcu drug par dbus su byon /
'bras spungs dgon par bkra shis sgo mang grwa tshang gi chos grwar zhugs /
don grub rgya mtsho slob dpon du bsten nas bsdus grwa sogs tshad ma'i skor gsan /
yun ring ma 'gyangs par tshad ma'i skor la bgro gleng byed thub par gyur /
dgung lo bcu bdun par stag tshang ra ba stod du phebs /
lo gcig lhag ring 'bad brtson tshad med mdzad de bsdus tshan tshang ma thugs 'dzin mthar phyin mdzad /
blo gsal rigs smra mang po'i dbus na 'gran zla bral ba'i mkhas par gyur /
de nas sgo mang du tshur byon nas slob dpon 'od zer rgya mtsho'i drung nas /
phar phyin skabs brgyad po dang dbu ma bcas gsan cing de dag gi rtsa ba rnams blor 'dzin mdzad /
gzhung sar gdong lnga'i sgra dbyangs kyi rgyugs phul bas tA la'i drug pa tshangs dbyangs rgya mtshos thugs dgyes pa chen po mdzad /
gzengs bstod dang gnang cha bstsal /
de nas 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa bla mar brten nas yang bskyar dbu ma dang phar phyin yongs rdzogs kyi brtsi bzhag bshad khrid dang bcas gsan cing thugs 'dzin mdzad /
'dul ba dang mngon pa'i gzhung rnams kyang legs par sbyangs nas dka' bcu pa'i mtshan rtags blangs /
mi ring bar 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i drung du bsnyen rdzogs kyi sdom pa zhus mtshan ngag dbang bkra shis zhes pa bstsal /
dgung lo nyer dgu bar dpal ldan smad rgyud grwa tshang du phebs nas gsang sngags kyi chos la slob gnyer gyi dbu btsugs /
khri chen dge 'dun phun tshogs kyi drung du bde gsang 'jigs gsum sogs kyi rgyud du ma gsan bsam yun ring mdzad de gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung lugs la thogs pa med par gyur /
khyad par 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i mdun rgyud 'grel rnams kyi bshad pa nan tan gyis gsan cing rgyud 'grel rnams kyi kha skong yan lag dang bcas pa rdzogs par gsan pa dang de'i zhor la 'don rta dbyangs gar thig sogs phyag len phra mo tshun chad zhib tu sbyangs pas grwa rgan gzhon kun gyis bstod bsngags byed /
gzhan yang 'jam bzhad mdun lam rim chen mo'i bshad lung dang bslab btus spyod 'jug sogs kyi bshad pa gsan /
bka' pod lnga'i dogs gcod yang yang byas pas 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa yang khong gi thugs rigs la thugs shin tu dgyes /
dgung lo so gnyis pa sa glang lor 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i zhabs phyir mdo smad du byon /
lam bar phyag g.yog byed pa'i zhor la mdo sngags kyi gzhung mang po'i dogs bkrol yang yang mdzad pas 'chad nyan nyams len gang la thug kyang gzhan dring mi 'jog pa'i spobs pa thob /
lcags stag lor 'jam dbyangs bzhad pas bla brang bkra shis 'khyil gyi dgon gsar du btab cing /
grwa tshang gsar 'dzugs skabs khong gis dge bskos mdzad de khrims sgrig lam tshang ma 'bras spungs sgo mang grwa tshang ltar mdzad /
lo de'i ston khar 'jam dbyangs bzhad pas rang gis 'bras sgo mang grwa tshang du mnabs myong ba'i ras ber rnying pa dang dbu zhwa bcas gnang nas !!khyod rang 'di dag gyon nas bla ma gyis'' gsungs nas bla brang bkra shis 'khyil gyi khri par bskos /
de nas bzung dgung lo re gcig pa sa rta lo'i bar lo nyer brgyad tsam 'chad nyan mdzad /
thog ma'i lo dgu tsam ring chos mtshams rnams su yang brtsi bzhag chag med du btang bas 'dzin grwa bcu gsum la po ti lnga'i 'chad nyan btsugs thub pa byung zhing bla brang bkra shis 'khyil gyi dgon par bshad grwa legs par 'dzugs pa'i rmang gzhi brtan po chags thub par byung ngo /
khong ni kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i yig char yun ring du 'dris shing nyams rgyus can yin stabs po ti lnga'i 'chad nyan tshang ma yig cha de dag gi thog nas mdzad cing tshang ma la zin bris kyang bkod /
khyad par bsdus grwa ni lo re bzhin thugs thog nas bshad pa skyor dpon rang rang gis zin bris byas pas /
bsdus grwa yongs rdzogs cung mi 'dra ba nyer bdun yod kyang rjes nas dpe rgyun thor bar brten deng sang gsum bzhi tsam las ma lhag par mngon /
chos mtshams rnams su yang mdo sngags kyi gzhung mang po'i bshad pa mdzad cing rtags gsal gtong ba'i dus su thal skad gtong lugs 'khor gsum skor lugs thal mo sdeb lugs sogs slob gnyer nan tan byed bcug ste shin tu gra 'grig po byed pa dang dpe cha blor 'dzin ni slob gnyer gyi rmang gzhi med du mi rung ba yin gsungs nas lcag bskul cher mdzad cing rgyugs legs par 'bul mi la gnang sbyin dang dgyes bstod dpag med mdzad pas gzhung chen mo'i rgyugs 'bul mkhan yang je mang du gyur /
slob ma rnams kyang rig pa'i gnas kun la don gnyer che zhing sgrig lam kun spyod tshang ma phyi gtsang nang gtsang kho nar gyur /
rten brten pa gsar bzhengs mdzad pa'i skor la mgon khang dang byams pa lha khang sku gdung khang bcas gsar du bzhengs pa dang 'du khang gi steng shod tshang mar logs ris shing tshon sogs gsar bskrun /
lha khang de dag nang gi lha sku dang mchod cha bcas dang dpon ju nang pa'i gdung rten dngul srang sum brgya las bzhengs pa'i mchod rten gsar bzhengs /
rje 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa ngag dbang brtson 'grus kyi sku gdung mdun mar me mchod kong stong tshar sogs mchod pa'i yo byad dpag tu med pa gsar du bzhengs /
'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i gsung phal mo che'i shing par gsar du brkos /
de nas bzung mdo smad kyi yul du bshad sgrub kyi bstan pa dbyar kyi chu bo bzhin gong nas gong du 'phel ba'i gzhi btsugs so / /
dgung lo drug cu re gcig pa rab byung bcu gnyis pa'i sa pho rta lo'i zla ba dang po'i tshes nyer lnga nyin par gzugs sku'i bkod pa chos dbyings su bsdus so / /
khong gi gsung rab ni rten 'brel gyi mtha' dpyod dang dbu ma'i mtha' dpyod 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i blo rig dang rtags rigs gnyis kyi zur rgyan /
'jam bzhad pa'i yig cha rnams kyi zin bris sogs mang du yod kyang dus dbang gis da lta tshang ma kha mi tshang zhing nged dpe mdzod khang du bla brang par ma po ti gnyis bzhugs yod /

bris ma /

gsol 'debs skor /
kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i sprul pa'i sku rin po che dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po'i zhal snga la smre sngags gdungs dbyangs gsol ba 'debs pa thugs rje'i nyin byed 'dren pa'i skya rengs zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /

gsol 'debs zhabs brtan /

'dod gsol /

yul lha'i bsang mchod kha skong /
yul lha ko'i tshang gtsor byas nyin srib gzhi bdag gi bsang mchod /
rtsom pa po'i lo rgyus nyung bsdus /
bla brang bkra shis 'khyil gyi bla ma rje 'jigs med rig pa'i seng ge ni /
dga' ldan khri chen dpal ldan grags pa'i sku 'phreng gsum pa ste /
khong ni rab byung bcu gsum pa'i me yos lo mjug mdo smad shar phyogs hor tshang zhes pa sku gong ma rnam gnyis 'khrungs pa'i yul phyogs kan su'u zhA ho rdzong khongs dmar steng zhang der khyu mchog gi rigs su sku bltams /
skyabs mchog 'jigs med dbang po byams pa 'bum gling du phebs lam nas ched gnyer gyis byon te /
gtsug phud bzhes nas mtshan 'jigs med grags pa zhes bstsal /
dgung lo lnga ba la ban sgar du gdan drangs nas der bzhugs so / /
dge slong bsam gtan mdun nas klog bslabs shing 'bri 'don gnyis ka tshegs med du byang ba byung /
dgung lo brgyad pa'i tshe dga' ldan khri chen rgyal mtshan seng ge nas rang gi bla ma'i sprul sku yin pa'i gnad kyis rgya mkhar sgar du gdan drangs nas /
rje de'i bka' ltar sgar der chos grwar phebs shing /
rje de la chos bka' 'ga' yang gsan /
dgung grangs bcu gsum pa'i skabs skyabs mchog 'jigs med dbang po dbus nas phebs par rtse gzhung du chibs bsur byon /
bkra shis 'khyil du phebs dgos gsungs par sngon gyi sku tshe du mar 'brel ba'i thugs smon gyi bden pa mngon du gyur te /
gsung dang blangs mdzad nas dgung lo bcu bzhi pa la sku gong ma'i gdan sa chen por zhabs sor bkod cing /
gnyis pa'i yar tshes dge bar rmad byung thos bsam gling gi chos grwar zhugs /
de nas bzung dgung lo nyer gsum pa'i bar bkra shis 'khyil rang du thugs sbyong gtso bor mdzad /
skyabs mgon rdo rje 'chang gi spyan sngar zab rgyas kyi gdams pa yang mang du gsan cing /
khong gi bka' ltar lcags stag lor dbus su chibs bsgyur nas gangs can mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas dpal ldan bkra shis sgo mang gi chos grwar sa khyi lo'i bar lo dgu'i yun la bka' pod chen po lnga'i thugs gnyer rdo rus thug pa gnang bas bstan pa'i gnad la gzhan gyis bkri bar mi nus pa'i nges shes rnyed /
rje gong ma de nyid /
rgyal dbang bdun pa chen po'i yongs 'dzin du song gshis gzhung sa nas kyang gzhan las khyad du thon pa'i bkur gzos tshad med pa gnang /
po ta lar paN chen blo bzang ye shes kyis rgyal dbang mchog la bka' chos gang gnang chag med du gsan /
lam rim chen mo dang bde lam gyi zin bris kyang khyad du 'phags pa zhig btab /
chos srid kyi mngon par mtho yang dman cha la dgyes pa /
yon tan gyi gter du gyur pa sogs bsngags par 'os pas paN chen thams cad mkhyen pa mchog gis kyang dgyes gzigs bla na med pa mdzad /
sa phag gi lor mdo smad du chibs bsgyur bar skyabs mgon mchog gi bka' ltar bsu ba snga phyi du ma dang /
grwa tshang gis ser sbreng rgyas pa sogs bkur sti dang bcas hor zla brgyad par gdan sa bkra shis 'khyil du phyag phebs /
de'i phyi lor skyabs mgon mchog gi bka' bzhin dben gnas dga' ldan rab rgyas kyi gzhi btings /
skabs skabs su gdan sar byon nas skyabs mgon mchog gi drung nas sgrub thabs rin 'byung sogs dang /
gzhan nas kyang bskyed rdzogs 'phrul 'khor lcags mkhar /
zab khrid du ma sogs zab rgyas chos kyi bdud rtsi bzhed dgur mnos /
don gnyer can du mas zhus ngor gsung 'bum mang po'i lung dang dbang rjes gnang mtha' yas pa zhig gnang yang 'dir yig tshogs la 'jigs pas ma bkod /
sa byi nas lo bzhi'i ring tshogs chen gyi chos khrir 'khod de chos srid gang cha nas bstan pa'i dmigs rkyen du 'gyur ba gnang /
lcags glang lor brag dkar dgon gyi khrir phebs /
spyir rje 'di nyid lung rtogs yon tan la mnga' brnyes pa'i mkhas grub chen po zhig ste /

sngon a kyA sku rabs dang po shes rab bzang po de nyid rje sku 'bum dgon pa'i nye skor li shu sde pa'i nang a tshang gi khyim du 'khrungs pas khyim rgyud kyi ming gis khong la a kyA tshang zhes pa'i mtshan thob pa red /
de nas bzung khong gi sku rabs tshang ma'i mtshan gyi dbur a kyA khyim rgyud kyi ming rgyun chags su gyur /
'dir kyA zhes pa ni rgya skad de bod skad du khyim tshang zhes pa'i don yin la mtsho sngon zhing chen gyi rgya bod 'dres mar gnas pa'i sa khul du dgon pa la zi dang khyim tshang la kyA zhes pa sogs rgya bod zung 'brel gyi ming shin tu mang ngo /
a kyA sku rabs gnyis pa blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan ni mdo smad tsong kha'i yul du rab byung bcu gnyis pa'i sa pho byi ba lo la sku bltams /
sku na gzhon pa'i dus nas a kyA shes rab bzang po'i yang srid du ngos 'dzin nas rje sku 'bum dgon du rab tu byung zhing sbyor klog blor 'dzin sogs la 'bad brtson mdzad /
dgung lo gzhon nu'i skabs su dbus lha ldan du phebs te se ra dgon par chos grwar zhugs /
slob dpon dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po bsten nas mdo sngags rig gnas bcas par gsan sbyong mthar phyin mdzad /
lha sa'i nye skor gyi gnas khyad par can dang rten phul byung tshang ma mjal skor zin rjes dgung lo nyer brgyad pa shing yos lor dbus nas mdo smad tsong kha'i yul du tshur byon /
mi ring bar sku 'bum dgon gyi rgyud pa grwa tshang gi gser khrir mnga' gsol te 'chad rtsod rtsom gsum dang bka' lung dbang gsum sogs rgyal bstan spel ba'i 'phrin las kho na mdzad cing seng ge mkhar gyi ri khrod rmang nas gso ba dang slob ma rab 'byams pa bsod nams blo gros sogs mkhas pa mang po spel /
rgyud pa'i bla ma yun ring mdzad cing bzhugs gnas phal che ba sku 'bum rgyud grwa'i bla brang du yin mod skabs 'gar seng ge mkhar ri khrod du sgrub pa nyams len mdzad de bzhugs pa red /
seng ge mkhar gyi sgrub sde 'di ni a kyA gong ma shes rab bzang pos dbyar gnas mkhan po mdzad cing chos 'chad nyan dge sgrub sdig sbyong sogs kyi srol legs par btsugs dgon pa'i sgrig lam yang 'dul ba nang ltar shin tu legs pa la brten dgon sde 'di nyid phyis su 'phel rgyas byung ba yin la /
khong ni a kyA sku rabs gnyis pa yin stabs dgon de'i bdag po mdzad dgos pa ni smos ci dgos /
khong dgung lo zhe brgyad tsam nas dgon de'i bdag po mdzad nas 'chad nyan sogs rnam dkar gyi 'phrin las rgya che mdzad /
de nas khong seng ge mkhar gyi sgrub sde'i 'dzin bdag mdzad mu'i skabs rgya nag pe cing yung ho kung dgon par 'chad nyan slob dpon du phebs /
khong dgung lo lnga bcu pa rab byung bcu gsum pa'i me glang lor seng ge mkhar gyi sgrub sde'i gtsug lag khang sogs zhig gso byed pa'i ched du pe cing nas dngul srang gnyis brgya yar bskur nas lo gcig lhag tsam la sgrub sder zhig gso yongs su grub /
pe cing du lo gsum lhag bzhugs shing ri bo rtse lnga sogs rgya nag gi gnas che khag la mjal bskor phebs /
dgung lo lnga bcu nga gnyis pa sa yos lor rgya nag nas rang yul mdo smad du tshur byon /
seng ge mkhar gyi sgrub sde yang gtsug lag khang nang rten dang bcas pa zhig gsos zin cing der bzhugs nas 'chad nyan sgrig bkod sogs gang ci'i bya ba mtha' dag gi 'gan bzhes te rgyud grwa'i khrid zur mdzad /
dgung lo nga lnga pa chu rta lor gong ma chan lung gi bka' ltar tA la'i brgyad pa 'jam dpal rgya mtsho khri 'don byed pa'i ched du dbus lha ldan du byon /
khams li thang dang 'ba' sogs brgyud de lho lam nas lha sar phebs lam bar dgon sde dang gnas chen rnams mjal zhing 'ba' li'i mtshams su gnas chen kaM po gangs r+wa mjal bas thugs 'phrog ste bstod pa snyan brjid ldan pa yang 'phral du mdzad /
khong dgung lo drug cu re gcig tu phebs pa rab byung bcu gsum pa'i sa byi lor mdo smad sku 'bum du sku gshegs so /

dbang lung rjes gnang bcas mang po zhus te /
rang gis nyams len dang /
dad ldan gzhan dag la 'chad nyan yang yun ring mdzad /
mkhas grub kyi slob ma yang mang du spel /
gsung 'bum skor la /
thub dbang gi mdzad pa bcu gnyis las brtsams pa'i mgur sogs mgur ma mang po dang /
'dul ba dang dbu ma'i skor gyi bshad pa /
snyan ngag don rgyan so lnga'i 'grel pa dang dpe brjod rnam thar gsol 'debs dang /
bstod tshogs skor /
sum cu pa'i dpe brjod /
bla ma'i rnal 'byor sogs sgrub thabs kyi skor bcas chos tshan re re bzhin ka kha'i go rim bsgrigs pa /
shing par mi 'dra ba gnyis tsam yod 'dug 'di gar nged dpe mdzod khang du gsung kha tshang gi po ti che legs shig bzhugs yod /

a mchog dkon mchog bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi gsung 'bum / /
par ma /
khyab bdag he ru ka dpal ngur smrig gi zol la brten pa rje dkon mchog bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i bka' 'bum las ka pa'i dkar chag bzhugs so / /
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa phyag rdor stod 'grel lugs lha re gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs dngos grub 'dod dgu sbyin byed brgya byin gtsug nor zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa lU i pa'i 'grel lugs 'khrul spong gi cho ga dpag bsam ljon shing zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa 'khrul spong lugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yid kyi 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa mai tri lugs lha bcu gsum gyi sgrub thabs bde chen rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje rnal 'byor ma lha so bdun ma'i sgrub thabs padma rA ga'i lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
sdom 'byung lha bcu gsum ma'i sgrub thabs bai DUr zhun ma'i lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
'khor lo sdom pa lwa ba lha bcu gsum ma'i sgrub thabs dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa 'khor lo bsgyur ba drug gi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga grub gnyis bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs dzam+bu'i chu gser gyi lhun po dngos grub yid bzhin 'gugs byed ces bya ba bzhugs so / /
'khor lo sdom pa drag po chen po'i sgrub thabs bklags chog tu bkod pa bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa bong bu'i zhal can gyi sgrub thabs 'chi med mchog sbyin bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
mchog gi rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs dngos grub rin chen 'byung gnas yid bzhin 'dod pa 'jo ba'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las bstan pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs grub pa'i dga' ston bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rdo rje phag gdong ma'i sgrub thabs gser gyi lhun po skal bzang yid bzhin 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i sgrub thabs grub pa klu dbang bye ba'i rol gnas legs bshad rin chen bye ba'i 'byung gnas dngos grub 'dod pa 'jo ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bde chen bdud rtsi'i chu gter dngos grub rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i bla brgyud gsol 'debs smon lam shis brjod dang bcas pa bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i dbyar rnga zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i bstod pa bai DUr+ya'i rgyud mang zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo sdom pa khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrub thabs rdo rje'i lhun po brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
phag mo 'byung bar grags pa bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje'i btsun mo'i sgrub thabs byu ru'i lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka'i sgrub thabs bklags chog tu bkod pa zla shel nor bu'i ri bo zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
par ma /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo sdom pa chen po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga mchog thun dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo sdom pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dngos grub rin chen 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo sdom pa chen po'i sgrub pa'i thabs rigs ldan zhal lung dngos grub 'dod pa 'jo ba yongs 'du'i ljon pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so / /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo sdom pa chen po'i bum skyed dang mdun skyed sbrags pa'i cho ga bzhugs so / /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo sdom pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid 'jug cing dbang ba'i rim pa rig 'dzin srog gi rtsi sman dngos grub rgya mtsho'i gter mdzod ces bya ba bzhugs so / /
rtsom pa po'i lo rgyus nyung bsdus /
dkon mchog bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan ni /
bod ldong gi rigs las brgyud pa rnga khog cog rtse rgyal po'i nang blon nga ro 'bum dang yum nam mkha' lcam mo gnyis kyi sras su rab byung bcu gsum pa'i sa mo lug lo la 'khrungs /
byis pa lo gsum lon pa na gung thang bstan pa'i sgron me gdan drangs te khong gi mdun du dge bsnyen bsgrubs /
sku gong ma bsod nams chos 'phel gyi yang srid yin min brtags pa sna tshogs brgyud nas a mchog gong ma bsod nams chos 'phel gyi sprul sku yin par thag bcad /
dgung lo lnga par sku gong ma'i sku mched rab 'byams pa chos 'byor rgya mtshos byis pa dkar chen dgon du gdan drangs te gong ma'i gdan khrir bkod /
rab 'byams pa blo bzang yon tan mdun dbang rjes gnang mang tsam zhus /
blo gling ye shes yar 'phel klog gi slob dpon du bsten nas chos spyod rig gnas rnams slob sbyong mdzad /
mkhan po blo bzang chos grags mdun rab tu byung zhing dge tshul gyi sdom pa blangs /
bla ma mchod pa'i khrid lung yang gsan /
dgung lo bcu gsum pa lcags lug lor dbus lha ldan du byon /
r+wa sgreng dang stag lung sogs zhib mjal rjes dga' ldan dgon par phebs /
dga' ldan khri drug cu re drug pa ngag dbang snyan grags dang shar rtse chos rje pha bong kha pa blo bzang chos 'phel sogs mjal zhing shar rtse'i tshogs chos su bzhugs / /
chu sprel smon lam chen mo'i skabs tA la'i dgu pa lung rtogs rgya mtsho mjal /
tre bo chos mdzad dang mnyam du tshad ma rnam 'grel bcas kyi tshogs gleng mdzad /
de nas dga' ldan dang gsang phu sogs su bka' pod rnams kyi dam bca' bzhag tshig don byang chub cing lan myur bas kun gyis bstod /
gsang phu'i dbyar chos la chos lugs ris med kyi grwa tshang bcu tshogs pa'i dbus su dka' bcu'i mtshan btags bzhes /
de nas dga' ldan du khri pa sogs la chos mang tsam zhus rjes gtsang du phebs /
bkra shis lhun por paN chen bdun pa bstan pa'i nyi ma mjal /
der seng chen blo bzang chos 'phel mdun chos 'ga' zhig zhus rjes rim gyis rang yul mdo smad du tshur byon /
sprul sku 'jam dbyangs rgya mtsho mdun nas snyan ngag sbyangs /
bla ma byams pa sogs la chos mang po zhus /
dgung lo nyer gnyis pa nas bzung bkra shis 'khyil du yang yang phebs nas gung thang bstan pa'i sgron me'i spyan sngar dge 'dun grangs tshang dbus su bsnyen rdzogs kyi sdom pa mnos /
'jam bzhad 'jigs med rgya mtsho dang sde khri 'jam dbyangs thub bstan nyi ma /
dpal ming dkon mchog rgyal mtshan sogs la chos bka' mtha' yas pa gsan /
sgra pa mthu stobs la sgra dang sa ris sbyangs /
snyan ngag mkhan 'jam dbyangs bde chen mdun snyan ngag bskyar du zhib par sbyangs /
dgung lo nyer lnga pa chu lug lor gung thang bstan pa'i sgron me'i bka' ltar dgon gsar 'debs kyi dbu btsugs /
rtsig rmang rko ba'i dus su sa 'og nas las mi kun bzang gis 'jam dbyangs smra ba'i seng ge'i rdo sku zhig rnyed pa khong la phul ba des rten gtso byas nas dgon bzhengs pas phyis su dgon pa'i ming smra ba'i seng ge'i gling zhes par chags /
dgon 'dir ki rti dge bshes blo bzang byams pa khri pa dang /
sgo mang ngag dbang tshul khrims dge bskos blo gling dge bshes dbu mdzad bcas bskos /
se 'bras dge gsum nas thon pa'i dge bshes mang pos bgro gleng mdzad de 'chad nyan gyi mgo btsugs /
de nas bzung dgon der gzhung pod lnga'i 'chad nyan dang thun mong rig gnas kyi bshad khrid bcas 'phel rgyas su phyin nas ris med grub mtha' kun gyi mkhas pa mang du thon /
mgo log gi yul du bsam 'grub bde ldan zhes pa'i dgon pa btab /
rten bzhengs kyang mang po mdzad /
snga phyir ris med kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dgu bcu lhag bsten nas zab chos zhus shing gzhung lugs mang po gsan pas mkhas pa chen por gyur /
zhal slob kyang bkra shis 'khyil gyi dge bshes shes rab rgya mtsho dang 'bras spungs dge bshes ngag dbang chos 'phel /
sgang pa sprul sku /
rgyam kho sprul sku sogs mkhas grags che ba mang du byung /
dgung lo zhe brgyad pa me rta lor bkra shis 'khyil du phebs nas dge pa'i bshes gnyen rnams la mtha' ma'i mjal kha zhus shing dgon pa'i dge 'dun la 'gyed mang ja dang rten byin can mdun mar me sogs kyi mchod pa rgya chen phul /
de nas yun mi ring bar zla ba bcu gnyis pa'i tshes nyi shu'i nyin nas bzung sku khams cung zad mi bde ba byung /
sman dang rim gro sogs la 'bad kyang phan pa ma byung bar dgung lo bzhi bcu zhe dgu pa rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i me mo lug gi lor sku mya ngan las 'das so / /
spyir khong dgung dar ma'i dus su sku gshegs pa'i dbang gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po bstan nas zab chos zhus pa dang dgon gsar 'debs sogs la thugs brel che bas gsung rab mang po rtsom khom ma byung zhing cung zad brtsams pa rnams kyang gsang sngags kyi chos dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs sna tshogs gtso bor byas pa las gzhung gzhan dag gi skor dang rig gnas thun mong gi rtsom ni phal cher brtsams ma myong ba 'dra /
nged dpe mdzod khang du khong gi gsung smra ba'i seng ge'i gling gi par ma sgrub thabs skor pod gnyis po cha tshang bzhugs yod /

mi nyag mgon po /
rnam thar rgya yig tu sgyur mkhan /
thang khri an /
rtsom sgrig gi bya bar gzhug mkhan /
ming rim bod yig ka mad ltar bsgrigs pa kra'o ping ru /
kho phreng ming /
ngag dbang nor bu /
thang khra'o phan /
yus hu'e hwa /
bsod nams rgya mtsho /
rtsom sgrig gi bya ba 'ga' shas la ched mngag gdan zhus ltar gzhug mkhan /
ming rim bod yig ka mad ltar bsgrigs pa bkra shis rin chen /
dung dkar blo bzang 'phrin las /
drung chen smon lam /
'bri gung dkon mchog bstan 'dzin /
'brog mi byams pa blo gros /
ye shes dbang phyug bshad sgra sras dga' ldan dpal 'byor /
dpe sgrig 'gan 'khur pa /
'jam dga' /
bstan 'dzin phun tshogs /
kha byang jus 'god pa /
karma rdo rje tshe ring /
kha yig 'bri mkhan /
sgrol ma skyabs /
dpe bsdur 'gan 'khur pa /
tshe ring mtsho mo /
shes bya'i gter mdzod /
mi rigs dpe mdzod khang gi dpe tho las gsung 'bum skor gyi dkar chag smad cha mi rigs dpe skrun khang gis bskrun zhing 'grems spel byas /
lo'i zla par par gzhi dang po bsgrigs /
lo'i zla par pe cin du par thengs dang po brgyab /
deb rer sgor . 
